anya-e0905n:10_0: Suṇātu me bhante saṅgho, mahatī ayaṃ parisā, evarūpāya parisāya na sukarā sabbaso
anya-e0905n:10_1: kathaṃ sāvetuṃ, tasmā āyasmato ca javanattherassa pakhukkūnagaravāsino āyasmato ca
anya-e0905n:10_3: vinayavissajjana bhārañca āvahituṃ okāsaṃ dammi, karotha tumhe āvuso chaṭṭhasaṃgītipubbaṅgamāni
anya-e0905n:14: Suṇātu me bhante saṅgho, yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, ahaṃ āyasmantaṃ vicittasārābhivaṃsaṃ tipiṭakadhara dhammabhaṇḍāgārikaṃ vinayaṃ puccheyyaṃ.
anya-e0905n:18: Suṇātu me bhante saṅgho, yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, ahaṃ āyasmatā javanattherena saṅghanāyaka mahātherassa paṭinidhibhūtena vinayaṃ puṭṭho vissajjeyyaṃ.
anya-e0905n:20: Pucchā – yaṃ tena āvuso bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena paṭhamaṃ pārājikaṃ kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:23: Vissajjanā – sudinnaṃ bhante kalandaputtaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:25: Vissajjanā – sudindo bhante kalandaputto purāṇadutiyikāya methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevi, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:26: Pucchā – atthi āvuso tattha paññatti anupaññatti anuppannapaññatti.
anya-e0905n:27: Vissajjanā – ekā bhante paññatti dve anupaññattiyo, anuppannapaññatti tasmiṃ natthi.
anya-e0905n:34: Pucchā – pañcannaṃ āvuso pātimokkhuddesānaṃ katthogadhaṃ kattha pariyāpannaṃ.
anya-e0905n:36: Pucchā – katamena āvuso uddesena uddesaṃ āgacchati.
anya-e0905n:37: Vissajjanā – dutiyena bhante uddesena uddesaṃ āgacchati.
anya-e0905n:38: Pucchā – catunnaṃ āvuso vipattīnaṃ katamā vipatti.
anya-e0905n:45: Vissajjanā – na evarūpaṃ karissāmīti yāvajīvaṃ āpāṇakoṭikaṃ samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu, ayaṃ bhante paṭipatti.
anya-e0905n:46: Pucchā – kati āvuso atthavase paṭicca bhagavatā paṭhamaṃ pārājikaṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:47_0: Vissajjanā – dasa bhante atthavase paṭicca bhagavatā paṭhamaṃ pārājikaṃ paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:47_2: 4 - pesalānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ phāsuvihārāya, 5 - diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya,
anya-e0905n:47_3: 6 - samparāyikānaṃ āsavānaṃ paṭighātāya, 7 - appasannānaṃ pasādāya, 8 - pasannānaṃ
anya-e0905n:55: Vissajjanā – yesaṃ bhante vattati te dhārenti.
anya-e0905n:57: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0905n:61_0: Suṇātu me bhante saṅgho ahaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ vicitthasārābhivaṃsaṃ tipiṭakadhara
anya-e0905n:61_1: dhammabhaṇḍāgārikaṃ paṭhamassa pārājikassa nidānampi pucchiṃ, puggalampi pucchiṃ,
anya-e0905n:61_2: vatthumpi pucchiṃ, paññatti anupaññattiādīnipi pucchiṃ, puṭṭho puṭṭhoca so āyasmāvicittasārābhivaṃso
anya-e0905n:61_3: vissajjesi, itihidaṃ bhante paṭhamaṃ pārājika sikkhāpadaṃ nimmalaṃ suparisuddhaṃ
anya-e0905n:61_4: tasseva bhagavato vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa, tasmā yathāpure mahākassapādayo
anya-e0905n:61_5: mahātheravarā porāṇasaṃgītikārā brahmacariya saṅkhātassa buddhasāsanassa ciraṭṭhitiyā
anya-e0905n:61_6: bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṃ
anya-e0905n:61_7: dhammavinayaṃ saṅgāyiṃsuceva anusaṅgāyiṃsuca, evameva mayampi dāni sabbeva chaṭṭhasaṃgītimahādhammasabhāpariyāpannā
anya-e0905n:61_8: idaṃ paṭhama pārājika sikkhāpadaṃ ekatosajjhāyanavasena saṃgāyeyyāma.
anya-e0905n:65_0: Suṇātu me bhante saṅgho, mahatī ayaṃ parisā, evarūpāya parisāya na sukarā sabbaso
anya-e0905n:65_1: kathaṃ sāvetuṃ, tasmā āyasmatoca sobhanassa sāsanari sārāmādhivāsino āyasmatoca vicittasārābhivaṃsassa
anya-e0905n:65_3: āvahituṃ okāsaṃ dammi, karotha tumhe āvuso chaṭṭhasaṃgītipubbaṅgamāni vinayapucchana
anya-e0905n:68: Suṇātu me bhante saṅgho, yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, ahaṃ āyasmantaṃ vicittasārābhivaṃsaṃ tipiṭakadhara dhammabhaṇḍāgārikaṃ vinayaṃ puccheyyaṃ.
anya-e0905n:72: Suṇātu me bhante saṅgho, yadisaṅghassa pattakallaṃ, ahaṃ āyasmatā sobhanattherena saṅghanāyaka mahātherassa paṭinidhibhūtena vinayaṃ puṭṭho vissajjeyyaṃ.
anya-e0905n:74: Pucchā – yaṃ tena āvuso bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena dutiyaṃ pārājikaṃ kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:77: Vissajjanā – dhaniyaṃ bhante kumbhakāraputtaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:79: Vissajjanā – dhaniyo bhante kumbhakāraputto rañño dārūni adinnaṃ ādiyi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:80: Pucchā – atthi āvuso tattha paññatti anupaññatti anuppannapaññatti.
anya-e0905n:81: Vissajjanā – ekā bhante paññatti ekā anupaññatti anuppannapaññatti tasmiṃ natthi.
anya-e0905n:83_0: Vissajjanā – yo pana bhikkhu adinnaṃ theyyasaṅkhātaṃ ādiyeyya, yathārūpe adinnādāne
anya-e0905n:83_1: rājāno coraṃ gahetvā haneyyuṃvā bandheyyuṃvā pabbājeyyuṃvā corosi bālosi muḷhosi
anya-e0905n:83_2: thenosīti tathārūpaṃ bhikkhu adinnaṃ ādiyamāno ayampi pārājiko hoti asaṃvāsoti ayaṃ
anya-e0905n:85: Vissajjanā – gāmāvā araññāvāti ayaṃ bhante tattha anupaññatti.
anya-e0905n:87_0: Vissajjanā – yo pana bhikkhu gāmāvā araññāvā adinnaṃ theyyasaṅkhātaṃ ādiyeyya, kathārūpe
anya-e0905n:87_1: adinnādāne rājāno coraṃ gahetvā haneyyuṃvā bandheyyuṃvā pabbājeyyuṃvā corosi bālosi
anya-e0905n:87_2: mūḷhosi thenosīti tathārūpaṃ bhikkhu adinnaṃ ādiyamāno ayampi pārājiko hoti asaṃvāsoti
anya-e0905n:94: Pucchā – tasmiṃ āvuso dutiya pārājike adinnaṃ ādiyanto kati āpattiyo āpajjati vibhajitvā vissajjehi.
anya-e0905n:95_0: Vissajjanā – adinnaṃ bhante ādiyanto tisso āpattiyo āpajjati, pañca māsakaṃvā atireka
anya-e0905n:95_1: pañca māsakaṃvā agghanakaṃ adinnaṃ theyyasaṅkhātaṃ ādiyati āpatti pārājikassa, ūnapañcamāsakaṃvā
anya-e0905n:95_2: atirekamāsakaṃvā adinnaṃ theyyasaṅkhātaṃ ādiyati āpatti thullaccayassa, māsakaṃvā
anya-e0905n:95_3: ūnamāsakavā agghanakaṃ adinnaṃ theyyasaṅkhātaṃ ādiyati āpatti dukkaṭassa, adinnaṃ
anya-e0905n:95_4: bhante ādiyanto imā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
anya-e0905n:97_0: Vissajjanā – dasannaṃ bhante puggalānaṃ anāpatti, sakasaññissa, vissāsaggāhena gaṇhantassa,
anya-e0905n:97_1: tāvakālikaṃ gaṇhantassa, petapariggahaṃ gaṇhantassa, tiracchānagatapariggahaṃ gaṇhantassa,
anya-e0905n:98: Pucchā – pañcannaṃ āvuso pātimokkhuddesānaṃ katthogadhaṃ katthapariyāpannaṃ.
anya-e0905n:100: Pucchā – katamena āvuso uddesena uddesaṃ āgacchati.
anya-e0905n:101: Vissajjanā – dutiyena bhante uddesena uddesaṃ āgacchati.
anya-e0905n:102: Pucchā – catunnaṃ āvuso vipattīnaṃ katamā vipatti.
anya-e0905n:104: Pucchā – sattannaṃ āvuso āpattikkhandhānaṃ katamo āpattikkhandho.
anya-e0905n:106: Pucchā – channaṃ āvuso āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti.
anya-e0905n:107: Vissajjanā – tīhi bhante samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti, siyā kāyatoca cittatoca samuṭṭhāti, na vācāto, siyā vācātoca
anya-e0905n:108: Cittatoca samuṭṭhāti, na kāyato, siyā kāyatoca vācātoca cittatoca samuṭṭhāti.
anya-e0905n:109: Pucchā – catunnaṃ āvuso adhikaraṇānaṃ katamaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ.
anya-e0905n:111: Pucchā – sattannaṃ āvuso samathānaṃ katihi samathehi sammati.
anya-e0905n:112: Vissajjanā – dvihi bhante samathehi sammati sammukhāvinayenaca paṭiññāta karaṇenaca.
anya-e0905n:113: Pucchā – ko āvuso tattha vinayo, ko tattha abhivinayo.
anya-e0905n:114: Vissajjanā – paññatti bhante vinayo vibhatti abhivinayo.
anya-e0905n:115: Pucchā – kiṃāvuso tattha pātimokkhaṃ kiṃ tattha adhipātimokkhaṃ.
anya-e0905n:116: Vissajjanā – paññatti bhante pātimokkhaṃ, vibhatti adhipātimokkhaṃ.
anya-e0905n:122: Vissajjanā – na evarūpaṃ karissāmīti yāvajīvaṃ āpāṇakoṭikaṃ samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu ayaṃ bhante tattha paṭipatti.
anya-e0905n:123: Pucchā – kati āvuso atthavase paṭicca bhagavatā dutiyaṃ pārājikaṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:124_0: Vissajjanā – dasa bhante atthavase paṭicca bhagavatā dutiyaṃ pārājikaṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:124_1: Saṅghasuṭṭhutāya saṅghaphāsutāya dummaṅkūnaṃ puggalānaṃ niggahāya pesalānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
anya-e0905n:124_2: phāsuvihārāya diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya samparāyikānaṃ āsavānaṃ paṭighātāya
anya-e0905n:124_3: appasannānaṃ pasādāya pasannānaṃ bhiyyobhāvāya saddhammaṭṭhitiyā vinayānuggahāya.
anya-e0905n:132: Vissajjanā – yesaṃ bhante vattati te dhārenti.
anya-e0905n:134: Vissajjanā – bhagavatā bhante vacanaṃ arahato sammāsammuddhassa.
anya-e0905n:137: Pucchā – atthi nu kho āvuso tattha upanetabbaṃ vā apanetabbaṃ vā akkharapadapaccābhaṭṭhaṃ vā viraddhapadabyañjanaṃ vā.
anya-e0905n:140_0: Suṇātu me bhante saṅgho ahaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ vicittasārābhivaṃsa tipiṭakadharadhammabhaṇḍāgārikaṃ
anya-e0905n:140_1: dutiyassa pārājikassa nidānampi pucchiṃ, puggalampi pucchiṃ, vatthumpi pucchiṃ, paññattimpi
anya-e0905n:140_2: pucchiṃ, anupaññattimpi pucchiṃ, āpattimpi pucchiṃ, anāpattimpi pucchiṃ, aññānipi
anya-e0905n:140_3: īdisāni pucchitabbaṭṭhānāni anekāni pucchiṃ, puṭṭho puṭṭhoca so āyasmā vicittasārābhivaṃso
anya-e0905n:140_4: vissajjesi. Iti hidaṃ bhante idaṃ dutiyaṃ pārājika sikkhāpadaṃ nimmalaṃ, suparisuddhaṃ,
anya-e0905n:140_5: tasseva bhagavato vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa, tasmā yathā pure mahākassa pādayo
anya-e0905n:140_7: bahujanahitāya, bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya, hitāya, sukhāya, devamanussānaṃ
anya-e0905n:140_8: dhammavinayaṃ saṅgāyiṃsuceva anusaṅgāyiṃsuca, evameva mayampi dāni sabbeva chaṭṭhasaṃgītimahādhammasabhāpariyāpannā
anya-e0905n:140_9: idaṃ dutiya pārājika sikkhāpadaṃ ekato gaṇasajjhāyaṃ katvā samaggā sammodamānā hutvā saṅgāyeyyāma.
anya-e0905n:142: Pucchā – yaṃ tena āvuso bhagavatā (pa) sammāsambuddhena tatiyaṃ pārājikaṃ kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:145: Vissajjanā – sambahule bhante bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:147: Vissajjanā – sambahulā bhante bhikkhu aññamaññaṃ jīvitā voropesuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:148: Pucchā – atthi nukho āvuso tattha paññatti anupaññatti anuppannapaññatti.
anya-e0905n:149: Vissajjanā – ekā bhante paññatti, ekā anupaññatti, anuppannapaññatti tasmiṃ natthi.
anya-e0905n:151: Vissajjanā – yopana bhikkhu sañcicca manussaviggahaṃ jīvitā voropeyya, satthahārakaṃvāssa pariyeseyya ayampi pārājiko hoti asaṃvāsoti ayaṃ bhante tattha mūlapaññatti.
anya-e0905n:153: Vissajjanā – maraṇavaṇṇaṃ vā saṃvaṇṇeyya maraṇāya vā samādapeyya ambhopurisa kiṃ tuyhiminā pāpakena dujjīvitena matante jīvitā
anya-e0905n:154: Seyyāti iti cittamano cittasaṅkappo anekapariyāyena maraṇavaṇṇaṃ vā saṃvaṇṇeyya maraṇāya vā samādapeyyāti ayaṃ bhante tattha anupaññatti.
anya-e0905n:156_0: Vissajjanā – yo pana bhikkhu sañcicca manussaviggahaṃ jīvitā voropeyya, satthahārakaṃvāssa
anya-e0905n:156_1: pariyeseyya, maraṇavaṇṇaṃ vā saṃvaṇṇeyya, maraṇāya vā samādapeyya, ambho purisa kiṃ
anya-e0905n:156_2: tuyhiminā pāpakena dujjīvitena matante jīvitā seyyoti iti cittamano cittasaṅkappo
anya-e0905n:156_3: anekapariyāyena maraṇavaṇṇaṃvā saṃvaṇṇeyya, maraṇāya vā samādapeyya, ayampi pārājiko
anya-e0905n:156_4: hoti asaṃvāsoti ayaṃ bhante tattha paripuṇṇapaññatti.
anya-e0905n:161: Pucchā – ekatopaññatti nukho āvuso ubhatopaññatti nukho.
anya-e0905n:163: Pucchā – tasmiṃ āvuso tatiya pārājike sañcicca manussaviggahaṃ jīvitā voropento kati āpattiyo āpajjati.
anya-e0905n:164_0: Vissajjanā – sañcissa bhante manussaviggahaṃ jīvitā voropento tisso āpattiyo āpajjati,
anya-e0905n:164_1: manussaṃ odissa papātaṃ khaṇati papatitvā marissatīti āpatti dukkaṭassa, papatite
anya-e0905n:164_2: dukkhā vedanā uppajjati āpatti thullaccayassa, marati āpatti pārājikassa, sañcicca
anya-e0905n:164_3: bhante manussaviggahaṃ jīvitā voropento imā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.

anya-e0905n:208_8: hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṃ dhammavinayaṃ saṅgāyiṃsuceva anusaṅgāyiṃsuca, evameva
anya-e0905n:208_9: mayampi dāni sabbeva chaṭṭhasaṃgītimahādhammasabhāpariyāpannā idaṃ tatiyapārājikasikkhāpadaṃ
anya-e0905n:208_10: ekato gaṇasajjhāyaṃ katvā samaggā sammodamānā hutvā saṃgāyeyyāma.
anya-e0905n:210: Pucchā – yaṃ tena āvuso bhagavatā jānatā passatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena catutthaṃ pārājikaṃ kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:213: Vissajjanā – vaggumudātīriye bhante bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:215: Vissajjanā – vaggumudātīriyā bhante bhikkhū gihīnaṃ aññamaññassa uttarimanussadhammassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsiṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:216: Pucchā – atthi āvuso tattha paññatti anupaññatti anuppannapaññatti.
anya-e0905n:217: Vissajjanā – ekā bhante paññatti ekā anupaññatti anuppannapaññatti tasmiṃ natthi.
anya-e0905n:219_0: Vissajjanā – yo pana bhikkhu anabhijānaṃ uttarimanussadhammaṃ uttarimanussadhammaṃ
anya-e0905n:219_1: attupanāyikaṃ alamariyañāṇadassanaṃ samudācareyya, itijānāmi itipassāmīti, tato aparena
anya-e0905n:219_2: samayena samanuggāhīya mānovā asamanuggāhīya mānovā āpanno visuddhāpekkho evaṃ vadeyya
anya-e0905n:219_3: ajānamevaṃ āvuso avacaṃ jānāmi apassaṃ passāmi tucchaṃ musāvilapinti ayampi pārājiko
anya-e0905n:219_4: hoti asaṃvāsoti ayaṃ bhante tattha mūlapaññatti.
anya-e0905n:221: Vissajjanā – aññatra adhimānāti ayaṃ bhante tattha anupaññatti.
anya-e0905n:222_0: Honti ye te ānanda bhikkhū adiṭṭhe diṭṭhasaññino apatte pattasaññino anadhigate adhigatasaññino
anya-e0905n:222_1: asacchikate sacchikatasaññano adhimānena aññaṃ byākaronti, tañca kho etaṃ abbohārikaṃ.
anya-e0905n:224_0: Vissajjanā – yopana bhikkhu anabhijānaṃ uttarimanussadhammaṃ attupanāyikaṃ alamariyañāṇadassanaṃ
anya-e0905n:224_1: samudācareyya, iti jānāmi iti passāmīti, tato aparena samayena samanuggāhīyamānovā
anya-e0905n:224_2: asamanuggāhīyamānovā āpanno visuddhāpekkho evaṃ vadeyya ajānamevaṃ āvuso avacaṃjānāmi
anya-e0905n:224_3: apassaṃ passāmi tucchaṃ musā vilapinti, aññatra adhimānā ayampi pārājiko hoti asaṃvāsoti
anya-e0905n:225: Pucchā – sabbatthapaññatti nukho āvuso padesapaññatti nukho.
anya-e0905n:229: Pucchā – ekatopaññatti nukho āvuso ubhato paññatti nukho.
anya-e0905n:231: Pucchā – tasmiṃ āvuso catuttha pārājike asantaṃ abhūtaṃ uttarimanussadhammaṃ ullapanto kati āpattiyo āpajjati, vibhajitvā vissajjehi.
anya-e0905n:232_0: Vissajjanā – tasmiṃ bhante catutthapārājike asantaṃ abhūtaṃ uttarimanussadhammaṃ
anya-e0905n:232_1: ullapanto tisso āpattiyo āpajjati, asantaṃ abhūtaṃ uttarimanussadhammaṃ ullapati
anya-e0905n:232_2: āpattipārājikassa, yo te vihāre vasati so bhikkhu arahāti bhaṇati paṭivijānantassa
anya-e0905n:232_3: āpatti thullaccayassa, appaṭivijānantassa āpatti dukkaṭassa, uttarimanussadhammaṃ
anya-e0905n:232_4: bhante ullapanto imā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
anya-e0905n:234: Vissajjanā – channaṃ bhante puggalānaṃ anāpatti adhimānena bhaṇantassa anullapanādhippāyassa ummattakassa khittacittassa vedanāṭṭassa ādikammikassa.
anya-e0905n:235: Pucchā – pañcannaṃ āvuso pātimokkhuddesānaṃ katthogadhaṃ kattha pariyāpannaṃ.
anya-e0905n:237: Pucchā – katamena āvuso uddesena uddesaṃ āgacchati.
anya-e0905n:238: Vissajjanā – dutiyena bhante uddesena uddesaṃ āgacchati.
anya-e0905n:239: Pucchā – catunnaṃ āvuso vipattīnaṃ katamā vipatti.
anya-e0905n:241: Pucchā – sattannaṃ āvuso āpattikkhandhānaṃ katamo āpattikkhandho.
anya-e0905n:243: Pucchā – channaṃ āvuso āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti.
anya-e0905n:244_0: Vissajjanā – channaṃ bhante āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ tīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti, siyā
anya-e0905n:244_1: kāyatoca cittatoca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato, siyā vācatoca cittatoca samuṭṭhāti, na
anya-e0905n:244_2: kāyato, siyā kāyatoca vācatoca cittatoca samuṭṭhāti.
anya-e0905n:245: Pucchā – catunnaṃ āvuso adhikaraṇānaṃ katamaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ.
anya-e0905n:247: Pucchā – sattannaṃ āvuso samathānaṃ katihi samathehi sammati.
anya-e0905n:248: Vissajjanā – sattannaṃ bhante samathānaṃ dvīhi samathehi sammati, sammukhāvinayenaca paṭiññātakaraṇenaca.
anya-e0905n:249: Pucchā – ko tattha āvuso vinayo, ko tattha abhivinayo.
anya-e0905n:250: Vissajjanā – paññatti bhante vinayo, vibhatti abhivinayo.
anya-e0905n:251: Pucchā – kiṃ āvuso tattha pātimokkhaṃ, kiṃ adhipātimokkhaṃ.
anya-e0905n:252: Vissajjanā – paññatti bhante pātimokkhaṃ, vibhatti adhipātimokkhaṃ.
anya-e0905n:258: Vissajjanā – na evarūpaṃ karissāmīti yāvajīvaṃ āpāṇakoṭikaṃ samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu ayaṃ bhante tattha paṭipatti.
anya-e0905n:259: Pucchā – kati āvuso atthavase paṭicca bhagavatā catutthaṃ pārājikaṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:260: Vissajjanā – dasa bhante atthavase paṭicca bhagavatā catutthaṃ pārājikaṃ paññattaṃ, saṅghasuṭṭhutāya saṅghaphāsutāya…pe… vinayānuggahāya.
anya-e0905n:268: Vissajjanā – yesaṃ bhante vattati te dhārenti.
anya-e0905n:270: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0905n:273: Pucchā – atthi nukho āvuso tattha kiñci upanetabbaṃ vā apanetabbaṃ vā akkharapadapaccābhaṭṭhaṃ vā viraddhapadabyañjanaṃ vā.
anya-e0905n:277: Pucchā – yaṃ tena āvuso bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena upakkamitvā asuciṃ mocentassa saṅghādiseso kattha paññatto.
anya-e0905n:280: Vissajjanā – āyasmantaṃ bhante seyyasakaṃ ārabbha paññatto.
anya-e0905n:282: Vissajjanā – āyasmā bhante seyyasako hatthena upakkamitvā asuciṃ mocesi, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññatto.
anya-e0905n:283: Pucchā – atthi āvuso tattha paññatti anupaññatti anuppannapaññatti.
anya-e0905n:284: Vissajjanā – ekā bhante paññatti, ekā anupaññatti, anuppannapaññatti tasmiṃ natthi.
anya-e0905n:286: Vissajjanā – sañcetanikā sukkavissaṭṭhi saṅghādisesoti ayaṃ bhante tattha mūlapaññatti.
anya-e0905n:288: Vissajjanā – aññatra supinantāti ayaṃ bhante tattha anupaññatti.
anya-e0905n:290: Vissajjanā – sañcetanikā sukkavissaṭṭhi aññatrasupinantā saṅghādisoti ayaṃ bhante tattha paripuṇṇapaññatti.
anya-e0905n:291: Pucchā – sādhāraṇa paññattinukho āvuso asādhāraṇa paññattinukho.
anya-e0905n:293: Pucchā – tattha āvuso upakkamitvā asuciṃ mocento kati āpattiyo āpajjati.
anya-e0905n:294: Vissajjanā – upakkamitvā bhante asuciṃ mocento tisso āpattiyo āpajjati, ceteti upakkamati muccati āpatti
anya-e0905n:295: Saṅghādisesassa, ceteti upakkamati na muccati āpatti thullaccayassa, payoge dukkaṭaṃ.
anya-e0905n:297: Vissajjanā – channaṃ bhante anāpatti supinantena mocentassa na mocanādhippāyassa ummattakassa khittacittassa vedanāṭṭassa ādikammikassa imesaṃ kho bhante channaṃ anāpatti.
anya-e0905n:298: Pucchā – pañcannaṃ āvuso pātimokkhuddesānaṃ katamena uddesena uddesaṃ āgacchati.
anya-e0905n:299: Vissajjanā – pañcannaṃ bhante pātimokkhuddesānaṃ tatiyena uddesena uddesaṃ āgacchati.
anya-e0905n:300: Pucchā – catunnaṃ āvuso vipattīnaṃ katamā vipatti.
anya-e0905n:307: Vissajjanā – na eva rūpaṃ karissāmīti yāvajīvaṃ āpāṇakoṭikaṃ samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu ayaṃ bhante paṭipatti.
anya-e0905n:308: Pucchā – kati āvuso atthavase paṭicca bhagavatā upakkamitvā asuciṃ mocentassa saṅghādiseso paññatto.
anya-e0905n:309: Vissajjanā – dasa bhante atthavase paṭicca bhagavatā upakkamitvā asuciṃ mocentassa saṅghādiseso paññatto saṅghasuṭṭhutāya…pe… vinayānuggahāya.
anya-e0905n:313: Vissajjanā – yesaṃ bhante vattati te dhārenti.
anya-e0905n:315: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0905n:318: Pucchā – atthi nukho āvuso tattha sanidāne sapadabhājanīye savinītavatthuke upanetabbaṃ vā apanetabbaṃ vā akkharapadapaccābhaṭṭhaṃ vā viraddhapadabyañjanaṃ vā.
anya-e0905n:320_0: Suṇātu me bhante saṅgho āyasmantaṃ vicittasārābhivaṃsaṃ tipiṭakadhara dhammabhaṇḍāgārikaṃ
anya-e0905n:320_1: paṭhamassa saṅghādisesa sikkhāpadassa nidānampi pucchiṃ, puggalampi pucchiṃ, vatthumpi
anya-e0905n:320_2: pucchiṃ, paññattimpi pucchiṃ, anupaññattimpi pucchi, āpattimpi pucchiṃ, anāpattimpi
anya-e0905n:320_3: pucchiṃ, aññānipi evarūpāni anekāni pucchitabbaṭṭhānāni pucchiṃ, puṭṭho puṭṭho ca
anya-e0905n:320_4: so āyasmā vicittasārābhivaṃso vissajjesi, itihidaṃ bhante paṭhama saṅghādisesa sikkhāpadaṃ
anya-e0905n:320_5: saparivāraṃ nimmalaṃ suparisuddhaṃ tasseva bhagavato vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0905n:320_6: Tasmā yathāpure mahākassapādayo mahātheravarā porāṇasaṃgītikārā brahmacariyassa ciraṭṭhitiyā
anya-e0905n:320_7: bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṃ
anya-e0905n:320_8: dhammavinayaṃ saṃgāyiṃsuceva anusaṃgāyiṃsuca, evameva mayampi sabbeva chaṭṭhasaṃgītimahādhammasabhā
anya-e0905n:320_9: pariyāpannā idaṃ paṭhamaṃ saṅghādisesa sikkhāpadaṃ nidānato paṭṭhāya ekaccānaṃ vacasā
anya-e0905n:320_10: sajjhāyavasena ekaccānaṃ manasā manasikaraṇavasenaca ekato gaṇasajjhāyaṃ katvā saṃgāyeyyāma.
anya-e0905n:321_0: Pucchā – yaṃ tena āvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena mātukāmena saddhiṃ kāyasaṃsaggaṃ
anya-e0905n:321_1: samāpajjantassa ca, mātugāmaṃ duṭṭhullāhi vācāhi obhāsantassa ca, mātugāmassa santike
anya-e0905n:321_2: attakāma pāricariyāya vaṇṇaṃ bhāsantassa ca, sañcarittaṃ samāpajjantassa ca saṅghādiseso kattha paññatto.
anya-e0905n:324: Vissajjanā – āyasmantaṃ bhante udāyittheraṃ ārabbha paññatto.
anya-e0905n:326_0: Vissajjanā – āyasmā bhante udāyitthero mātugāmena saddhiṃ kāyasaṃsaggaṃ samāpajji,
anya-e0905n:326_1: āyasmāyeva bhante udāyitthero mātugāmaṃ duṭṭhullāhi vācāhi obhāsi, āyasmāyeva bhante
anya-e0905n:326_2: udāyitthero mātugāmassa santike attakāma pāricariyāya vaṇṇaṃ abhāsi, āyasmāyeva bhante
anya-e0905n:326_3: udāyitthero sañcarittaṃ samāpajjiṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññatto.
anya-e0905n:328: Pucchā – yaṃ tena āvuso…pe… sammāsambuddhena saññācikāya kuṭiṃ kārāpentassa saṅghādiseso kattha paññatto.
anya-e0905n:331: Vissajjanā – āḷavike bhante bhikkhū ārabbha paññatto.
anya-e0905n:333: Vissajjanā – āḷavikā bhante bhikkhū saññācikāyo kuṭiyo kārāpesuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññatto.
anya-e0905n:335: Pucchā – yaṃ tena āvuso…pe… sammāsambuddhena mahallakaṃ vihāraṃ kārāpentassa saṅghādiseso kattha paññatto.
anya-e0905n:338: Vissajjanā – āyasmantaṃ bhante channattheraṃ ārabbha paññatto.
anya-e0905n:340_0: Vissajjanā – āyasmā bhante channo vihāravatthuṃ sodhento aññataraṃ cetiyarukkhaṃ
anya-e0905n:340_1: chedāpesi gāmapūjitaṃ nigamapūjitaṃ nagara pūjitaṃ janapadapūjitaṃ raṭṭhapūjitaṃ,
anya-e0905n:342_0: Pucchā – yaṃ tena āvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena bhikkhuṃ amūlakena pārājikena
anya-e0905n:342_1: dhammena anuddhaṃsentassa ca, bhikkhuṃ aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa kiñcidesaṃ lesamattaṃ
anya-e0905n:342_2: upādāya pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṃsentassa ca saṅghādiseso kattha paññatto.
anya-e0905n:344: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññatto.
anya-e0905n:345_0: Vissajjanā – mettiyabhūmajakā bhante bhikkhū ārabbha paññatto, mettiyabhūmajakā bhante
anya-e0905n:345_1: bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ amūlakena pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṃsesuṃ,
anya-e0905n:345_2: teyeva bhante mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ aññabhāgiyassa
anya-e0905n:345_3: adhikaraṇassa kiñcidesaṃ lesamattaṃ upādāya pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṃsesuṃ, tasmiṃ
anya-e0905n:347: Pucchā – yaṃ tena āvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena saṅghabhedakassa bhikkhuno yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya appaṭinissajjantassa saṅghādiseso kattha paññatto.
anya-e0905n:349: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattho.
anya-e0905n:351: Devadatto bhante samaggassa saṅghassa bhedāya parakkami, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññatto.
anya-e0905n:353: Pucchā – yaṃ tena āvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena bhedānuvattakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya appaṭinissajjantānaṃ saṅghādiseso kattha paññatto.
anya-e0905n:355: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññatto.
anya-e0905n:356_0: Vissajjanā – sambahule bhante bhikkhū ārabbha paññatto, sambahulā bhante bhikkhū
anya-e0905n:356_1: devadattassa saṅghābhedāya parakkamantassa anuvattakā ahesuṃ vaggavādakā, tasmiṃ
anya-e0905n:358: Pucchā – yaṃ tena āvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena dubbacassa bhikkhuno yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya appaṭinissajjantassa saṅghādiseso kattha paññatto.
anya-e0905n:360: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññatto.
anya-e0905n:361: Vissajjanā – āyasmantaṃ bhante channaṃ ārabbha paññatto, āyasmā bhante channo bhikkhūhi sahadhammikaṃ vuccamāno attānaṃ avacanīyaṃ akāsi, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññatto.
anya-e0905n:363: Pucchā – yaṃ tena āvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena kuladūsakassa bhikkhuno yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya appaṭinissajjantassa saṅghādiseso kattha paññatto.
anya-e0905n:365: Pucchā – kaṃ ārabbha āvuso kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññatto.
anya-e0905n:366_0: Vissajjanā – assaji punabbasuke bhante bhikkhū ārabbha paññatto, assajipunabbasukā
anya-e0905n:366_1: bhante bhikkhū saṅghena pabbājanīyakammakatā chandagāmitā dosagāmitā mohagāmitā bhayagāmitā
anya-e0905n:368: Pucchā – yaṃ tena āvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena paṭhamo ca aniyato dutiyo ca aniyato kattha paññatto.
anya-e0905n:370: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññatto.
anya-e0905n:371_0: Vissajjanā – āyasmantaṃ bhante udāyiṃ ārabbha paññatto, āyasmā bhante udāyī mātugāmena
anya-e0905n:371_1: saddhiṃ ekoekāya raho paṭicchanne āsane alaṃkammaniye nisajjaṃ kappesi, tasmiñca
anya-e0905n:371_2: vatthusmiṃ, āyasmāyeva bhante udāyī mātugāmena saddhiṃ raho nisajjaṃ akāsi, tasmiñca
anya-e0905n:373: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0905n:376: Pucchā – atthi nukho āvuso ettha kocipi viraddhadoso.
anya-e0905n:379_0: Suṇātu me bhante saṅgho, ahaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ vicittasārābhivaṃsaṃ tipiṭakadhara
anya-e0905n:379_1: dhammabhaṇḍāgārikaṃ paṭhama duṭṭhadosa sikkhāpadato paṭṭhāya pucchitabbāni anekāni
anya-e0905n:379_2: ṭhānāni pucchiṃ, so ca āyasmā puṭṭho puṭṭho vissajjeti, itihidaṃ bhante sabbaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ
anya-e0905n:379_3: nimmalaṃ suparisuddhaṃ tasseva bhagavato vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa, tasmā
anya-e0905n:379_4: yathāpure mahākassapādayo mahātheravarā porāṇasaṃgītikārā brahmacariyassa ciraṭṭhitiyā
anya-e0905n:379_5: bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṃ
anya-e0905n:379_6: saṃgāyiṃsuceva anusaṃgāyiṃsuca, evameva mayampi dāni sabbeva chaṭṭhasaṃgīti mahādhammasabhāpariyāpannā
anya-e0905n:379_7: imāni sikkhāpadāni ekato gaṇasajjhāyaṃ katvā saṃgāyeyyāma.
anya-e0905n:382: Pucchā – yaṃ tena āvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena atirekacīvaraṃ dasāhaṃ atikkāmentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:384: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:385: Vissajjanā – chabbaggiye bhante bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū atirekacīvaraṃ dhāresuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:387: Pucchā – ekarattaṃ āvuso ticivarena vippavasantassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:389: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:390_0: Vissajjanā – sambahule bhante bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, sambahulā bhante bhikkhū
anya-e0905n:390_1: bhikkhūnaṃ hatthe cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā santaruttarena janapadacārikaṃ pakkamiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:392: Pucchā – akālacīvaraṃ āvuso paṭiggahetvā māsaṃ atikkāmentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:394: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:395: Vissajjanā – sambahule bhante bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, sambahulā bhante bhikkhū akālacīvaraṃ paṭiggahetvā māsaṃ atikkāmesuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:397: Pucchā – aññātikāya āvuso bhikkhuniyā purāṇacīvaraṃ dhovāpentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:399: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:400: Vissajjanā – āyasmantaṃ bhante udāyiṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, āyasmā bhante udāyī aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā purāṇacīvaraṃ dhovāpesi, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:402: Pucchā – aññātikāya āvuso bhikkhuniyā hatthato cīvaraṃ paṭiggaṇhantassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:404: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:405: Vissajjanā – āyasmantaṃ bhante udāyiṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, āyasmā bhante udāyī aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā hatthato cīvaraṃ paṭiggahesi, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:407: Pucchā – aññātakaṃ āvuso gahapatiṃvā gahatāniṃvā cīvaraṃ viññāpentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:409: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:410_0: Vissajjanā – āyasmantaṃ bhante upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, āyasmā bhante
anya-e0905n:410_1: upanando sakyaputto aññātakaṃ seṭṭhiputtaṃ cīvaraṃ viññāpesi, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:412: Pucchā – aññātakaṃ āvuso gahapatiṃ vā gahapatāniṃ vā tatuttari cīvaraṃ viññāpentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:414: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:415: Vissajjanā – chabbaggiye bhante bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū na mattaṃ jānitvā bahumpi cīvaraṃ viññāpesuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:416_0: Pucchā – pubbe appavāritassa āvuso aññātakaṃ gahapatiṃ vā gahatāniṃ vā upasaṅkamitvā
anya-e0905n:416_1: cīvare vikappaṃ āpajjantassa ca aññātake gahapatike upasaṅkamitvā cīvare vikappaṃ
anya-e0905n:416_2: āpajjantassa ca nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:418: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:419_0: Vissajjanā – āyasmantaṃ bhante upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, āyasmā bhante
anya-e0905n:419_1: upanando sakyaputto pubbe appavārito aññātakaṃ gahapatikaṃ upasaṅkamitvā cīvare vikappaṃ
anya-e0905n:419_2: āpajji. Soyeva bhante āyasmā upanando sakyaputto pubbe appavārito aññātake gahapatike
anya-e0905n:419_3: upasaṅkamitvā cīvare vikappaṃ āpajji, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:421: Pucchā – atirekatikkhattuṃ āvuso codanāya atireka chakkhattuṃ ṭhānena cīvaraṃ abhinipphādentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:423: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:424_0: Vissajjanā – āyasmantaṃ bhante upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, āyasmā bhante
anya-e0905n:424_1: upanando sakyaputto upāsakena ajjaṇho bhante āgamehīti vuccamāno nāgamesi, tasmiṃ
anya-e0905n:426: Pucchā – kosiyamissakaṃ āvuso santhakaṃ kārāpentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:428: Pucchā – kaṃ 0 āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:429_0: Vissajjanā – chabbaggiye bhante ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū kosiyakārake
anya-e0905n:429_1: upasaṅkamitvā evamahaṃsu bahū āvuso kosakārake pacatha amhākampi dassatha mayampi
anya-e0905n:429_2: icchāma kosiyamissakaṃ santakaṃ kātunti, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:431: Pucchā – suddhakāḷakānaṃ āvuso eḷakalomānaṃ santhataṃ kārāpentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:433: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:434: Vissajjanā – chabbaggiye bhante bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū suddhakāḷakānaṃ eḷakalomānaṃ santhataṃ kārāpesuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:436: Pucchā – anādiyitvā āvuso tulaṃ odātānaṃ tulaṃ gocariyānaṃ navaṃ santhataṃ kārāpentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:438: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:439_0: Vissajjanā – chabbaggiye bhante bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū
anya-e0905n:439_1: thokaṃyeva odātaṃ ante ādiyitvā tatheva suddhakāḷakānaṃ eḷakalomānaṃ santhataṃ kārāpesuṃ,
anya-e0905n:441: Pucchā – yaṃ tena āvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena anuvassaṃ kārāpentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:443: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:444: Vissajjanā – sambahule bhante bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, sambahulā bhante bhikkhū anuvassaṃ santhataṃ kārāpesuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:446: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0905n:449: Pucchā – atthi nukho āvuso ettha koci viraddhadoso.
anya-e0905n:452_0: Suṇātu me bhante saṅgho, ahaṃ āyasmantaṃ vicittasārābhivaṃsaṃ tipiṭakadhara dhammabhaṇḍāgārikaṃ
anya-e0905n:452_1: imesaṃ nissaggiyapācittiyasikkhāpadānaṃ yāva chabbassasikkhāpadaṃ nidānādīni pucchitabbāni
anya-e0905n:452_2: anekāni ṭhānāni pucchiṃ, puṭṭhopuṭṭho ca so āyasmā vicittasārābhivaṃso vissajjesi,
anya-e0905n:452_3: itihidaṃ bhante imāni sikkhāpadāni nimmalāni suparisuddhānī tasseva bhagavato vacanāni
anya-e0905n:452_4: arahato sammāsambuddhassa, tasmā yathāpure mahākassapādayo mahātheravarā porāṇasaṃgītikārā
anya-e0905n:452_5: brahmacariyassa ciraṭṭhitiyā bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya
anya-e0905n:452_6: hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṃ dhammavinayaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu ceva anusaṃgāyiṃsu ca, evameva
anya-e0905n:452_7: mayampi dāni sabbeva chaṭṭhasaṃgīti mahādhammasabhā pariyāpannā chabbassa nissaggiya
anya-e0905n:452_8: sikkhāpadato paṭṭhāya imāni nissaggiyasikkhāpadāni ekato gaṇasajjhāyaṃ katvā saṃhāyeyyāma.
anya-e0905n:454_0: Pucchā – yaṃ tena āvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena anādiyitvā purāṇasanthatassa
anya-e0905n:454_1: sāmantā sugatavidattiṃ navaṃ nisīdanasanthataṃ kārāpentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:456: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:457_0: Vissajjanā – sambahule bhante bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, sambahulā bhante bhikkhū
anya-e0905n:457_1: santhatāni ujjhitvā āraññikaṃ piṇḍapātikaṅgaṃ paṃsukūlakaṅgaṃ samādiyiṃsu, tasmiṃ
anya-e0905n:459: Pucchā – eḷakalomāni āvuso paṭiggahetvā tiyojanaṃ atikkāmentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:461: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:462: Vissajjanā – aññataraṃ bhante bhikkhuṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, aññataro bhante bhikkhu eḷakalomāni paṭiggahetvā tiyojanaṃ atikkāmesi, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:464: Pucchā – aññātikāya āvuso bhikkhuniyā eḷakalomāni dhovāpentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:466: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:467: Vissajjanā – chabbaggiye bhante bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū aññātikāhi bhikkhūnīhi eḷakalomāni dhovāpesuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:469: Pucchā – rūpiyaṃ āvuso paṭiggaṇhantassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:471: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:472: Vissajjanā – āyasmantaṃ bhante upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, āyasmā bhante upanando sakyaputto rūpiyaṃ paṭiggahesi, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:473: Pucchā – kathaṃ āvuso tattha paṭipajjanto rūpiyaṃ paṭiggaṇhāti nāma.
anya-e0905n:474: Vissajjanā – sayaṃ bhante gaṇhāti, aññaṃ vā gaṇhāpesi, idaṃ ayyassa hotūti upanikkhittaṃ sādiyati, evaṃ kho bhante paṭipajjanto bhikkhu rūpiyaṃ paṭiggaṇhāti nāma.
anya-e0905n:475: Pucchā – kathaṃ āvuso tattha paṭipajjanto bhikkhu rūpiyaṃ na paṭiggaṇhāti nāma.
anya-e0905n:476: Vissajjanā – yathā bhante rājasikkhāpade yathā ca bhante meṇḍakasikkhāpade āgacchati, tathā bhante paṭipajjanto bhikkhu rūpiyaṃ na paṭiggaṇhātināma.
anya-e0905n:478: Pucchā – rūpiyasaṃvohāraṃ āvuso samāpajjantassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:480: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:481: Vissajjanā – chabbaggiye bhante bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū nānappakārakaṃ rūpiyasaṃvohāraṃ samāpajjiṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:483: Pucchā – nānappakārakaṃ āvuso kayavikkayaṃ āpajjantassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:485: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:486_0: Vissajjanā – āyasmantaṃ bhante upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, āyasmā bhante
anya-e0905n:486_1: upanando sakyaputto paribbājakena saddhi kayavikkayaṃ samāpajji, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:487: Pucchā – kathaṃ āvuso tattha paṭipajjanto bhikkhu kayavikkayaṃ samāpajjatināma.
anya-e0905n:488: Vissajjanā – iminā imaṃ dehi iminā imaṃ āhara iminā imaṃ parivattehi iminā imaṃ cetāmehīti ajjhācarati, evaṃ kho bhante paṭipajjanto kayavikkayaṃ samāpajjatināma.
anya-e0905n:489: Pucchā – kathaṃ āvuso tattha paṭipajjanto bhikkhu na kayavikkayaṃ samāpajjatināma.
anya-e0905n:490_0: Vissajjanā – yo bhante agghaṃ pucchati, yo ca bhante kappiyakārakassa ācikkhati,
anya-e0905n:490_1: yo ca bhante amhākañca idaṃ atthi amhākañca iminā ca iminā ca atthoti bhaṇati, evaṃ
anya-e0905n:490_2: kho bhante paṭipajjanto bhikkhu na kayavikkayaṃ samāpajjatināma.
anya-e0905n:492: Pucchā – atirekapattaṃ āvuso dasāhaṃ atikkāmentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:494: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:495: Vissajjanā – chabbaggiye bhante bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū atirekapattaṃ dhāresuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:497: Pucchā – ūnapañcabandhanena pattena aññaṃ navaṃ pattaṃ cetāpentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:499: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:500_0: Vissajjanā – chabbaggiye bhante bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū
anya-e0905n:500_1: appamattakenapi bhinnena appamattakenapi khaṇḍena vilikhitamattenapi bahū patte viyyāpesuṃ,
anya-e0905n:501: Na bhikkhave patto viññāpetabbo, yo viññāpeyya āpatti dukkaṭassa.
anya-e0905n:503: Pucchā – bhesajjāni āvuso paṭiggahetvā sattāhaṃ atikkāmentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:505: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:506: Vissajjanā – sambahule bhante bhikkhū ārabbha ārabbha paññattaṃ, sambahulā bhante bhikkhū bhesajjāni paṭiggahetvā sattāhaṃ atikkāmesuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:508: Pucchā – atirekamāse sese gimāne āvuso vassikasāṭikacīvaraṃ pariyesantassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:510: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:511: Vissajjanā – chabbaggiye bhante bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū atirekamāse sese gimhāne vassikasāṭikacīvaraṃ pariyesiṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:513: Pucchā – bhikkhussa āvuso sāmaṃ cīvaraṃ datvā kupitena anattamanena acchindantassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:515: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:516_0: Vissajjanā – āyasmantaṃ bhante upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, āyasmā bhante
anya-e0905n:516_1: upanando sakyaputto bhikkhussa sāmaṃ cīvaraṃ datvā kupito anattamano acchindi, tasmiṃ
anya-e0905n:518: Pucchā – sāmaṃ āvuso suttaṃ viññāpetvā tantavāyehi cīvaraṃ vāyāpentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:520: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:521: Vissajjanā – chabbaggiye bhante bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū sāmaṃ suttaṃ viññāpetvā tantavāyehi cīvaraṃ vāyāpesuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:523: Pucchā – pubbe appavāritassa āvuso aññātakassa gahapatikassa tantavāye upasaṅkamitvā cīvare vikappaṃ āpajjantassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:525: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:526_0: Vissajjanā – āyasmantaṃ bhante upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, āyasmā bhante
anya-e0905n:526_1: upanando sakyaputto pubbe appavārito aññātakassa gahapatikassa tantavāye upasaṅkamitvā
anya-e0905n:526_2: cīvare vikappaṃ āpajji, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:528: Pucchā – acceka cīvaraṃ āvuso paṭiggahetvā cīvarakālasamayaṃ atikkāmentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:530: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:531: Vissajjanā – sambahule bhante bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, sambahulā bhante bhikkhū accekacīvaraṃ paṭiggahetvā cīvarakālasamayaṃ atikkāmesuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:533: Pucchā – tiṇṇaṃ āvuso cīvarānaṃ aññataraṃ cīvaraṃ antaraghare nikkhipitvā atirekachārattaṃ vippavasantassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:535: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:536_0: Vissajjanā – sambahule bhante bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, sambahulā bhante bhikkhū
anya-e0905n:536_1: tiṇṇaṃ cīvarānaṃ aññataraṃ cīvaraṃ antaraghare nikkhipitvā atirekachārattaṃ vippavasiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:538: Pucchā – yaṃ tena āvuso bhagavatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena jānaṃ saṅghikaṃ lābhaṃ atthano pariṇāmentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:540: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:541: Vissajjanā – chabbaggiye bhante bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū jānaṃ saṅghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇataṃ attano pariṇāmesuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:542: Pucchā – jānaṃ āvuso saṅghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇataṃ attano pariṇāmento, kati āpattiyo āpajjati.
anya-e0905n:543_0: Vissajjanā – jānaṃ bhante saṅghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇataṃ attano pariṇāmento dve āpattiyo
anya-e0905n:543_1: āpajjati, pariṇāmeti payoge dukkaṭaṃ, pariṇāmite nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ, jānaṃ bhante
anya-e0905n:543_2: saṅghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇataṃ attano pariṇāmento imā dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
anya-e0905n:545: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0905n:548: Pucchā – atthi nukho āvuso tattha kocipi viraddhadoso.
anya-e0905n:551_0: Suṇātu me bhante saṅgho, ahaṃ bhante imesaṃ soḷasannaṃ nissaggiyapācittiyasikkhāpadānaṃ
anya-e0905n:551_1: nidānādīni anekāni pucchitabbāni āyasmantaṃ vicittasārābhivaṃsaṃ tipiṭakadhara dhammabhaṇḍāgārikaṃ
anya-e0905n:551_2: pucchiṃ, so ca puṭṭho puṭṭho vissajjeti, itihidaṃ bhante sikkhāpadasañjātaṃ nimmalaṃ
anya-e0905n:551_3: su parisuddhaṃ tasseva bhagavato vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa, tasmā yathā pure
anya-e0905n:551_4: mahākassapādayo mahāthera varā porāṇasaṃgītikārā brahmacariyasaṅkhātassa buddhasāsanassa
anya-e0905n:551_5: ciraṭṭhitiyā bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya
anya-e0905n:551_6: devamanussānaṃ dhammavinayaṃ saṃgāyiṃsuceva anusaṃgāyiṃsuca, evameva mayampi dāni
anya-e0905n:554: Pucchā – yaṃ tena āvuso bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena sampajānamusāvāde pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:555_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante paññattaṃ, hatthakaṃ sakyaputtaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:555_1: hatthako bhante sakyaputto titthiyehi saddhiṃ sallapanto avajānitvā paṭijānāti paṭijānitvā
anya-e0905n:557: Pucchā – omasavāde pācittiyañca āvuso bhikkhupesuññe pācittiyañca bhagavatā katthapaññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:558_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante paññattaṃ, chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:558_1: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ bhaṇḍantā omasiṃsu tasmiṃca vatthusmiṃ,
anya-e0905n:558_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū bhikkhūnaṃ bhaṇḍanajātānaṃ kalahajātānaṃ vivādāpannānaṃ
anya-e0905n:558_3: pesuññaṃ upasaṃhariṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:560: Pucchā – anupasampannaṃ āvuso padaso vācentassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:561: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante paññattaṃ, chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū upāsake padaso dhammaṃ vācesuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:563: Pucchā – anupasampannena āvuso uttaridirattatirattaṃ sahaseyyaṃ kappentassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:564: Vissajjanā – āḷaviyaṃ bhante paññattaṃ, sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, sambahulā bhante bhikkhū anupasampannena sahaseyyaṃ kappesuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:565: Pucchā – kesaṃ āvuso ettha anupasampannena sahaseyyaṃ kappentānampi anāpatti hoti.
anya-e0905n:566_0: Vissajjanā – ekādasannaṃ bhante puggalānaṃ anupasampannena sahaseyyaṃ kappentānaṃ
anya-e0905n:566_1: anāpatti, dvetisso rattiyo vasatī, ūnakadve tisso rattiyo vasati, dverattiyo vasitvā
anya-e0905n:566_2: tatiyāyarattiyā purāruṇā nikkhamitvā puna vasati, sabbacchanne sabbaaparicchanne,
anya-e0905n:566_3: sabbaparicchanne sabbaacchanne, yebhuyyena acchanne yebhuyyena aparicchanne, anupasampanne
anya-e0905n:566_4: nipanne bhikkhu nisīdati, bhikkhunipanne anupasampanno nisīdati, ubhovā nisīdanti,
anya-e0905n:566_5: ummattakassa, ādikammikassa, imesaṃkho bhante ekādasannaṃ puggalānaṃ anupasampannena
anya-e0905n:568: Pucchā – mātugāmena āvuso sahaseyyaṃ kappentassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:569: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ anuruddhaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, āyasmā bhante anuruddho mātugāmena sahaseyyaṃ kappesi, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:571: Pucchā – mātugāmassa āvuso uttari chappañcavācāhi dhammaṃ desentassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:572: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ udāyiṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, āyasmā bhante udāyī mātugāmassa dhammaṃdeseti, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:574: Pucchā – anupasampannassa āvuso uttarimanussadhammaṃ bhūtaṃ ārocentassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:575_0: Vissajjanā – vesāliyaṃ bhante vaggumudātīriye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, vaggumudātīriyā
anya-e0905n:575_1: bhante bhikkhū gihīnaṃ aññamaññassa uttarimanussadhammassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsiṃsu, tasmiṃ
anya-e0905n:577: Pucchā – bhikkhussa āvuso duṭṭhullāpattiṃ anupasampannassa ārocentassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:578_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā
anya-e0905n:578_1: bhante bhikkhū bhikkhussa duṭṭhullāpattiṃ anupasampannassa ārocesuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante
anya-e0905n:580: Pucchā – pathaviṃkhaṇantassa āvuso pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:581: Vissajjanā – āḷaviyaṃ bhante āḷavike bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, āḷavikā bhante bhikkhū pathaviṃkhaṇiṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:583: Pucchā – bhūtagāmapātabyatāya pācittiyaṃ āvuso bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:584: Vissajjanā – āḷaviyaṃ bhante āḷavike bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, āḷavikā bhante bhikkhū rukkhaṃ chindiṃ su, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:586: Pucchā – aññavādake vihesake pācittiyaṃ āvuso bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:587_0: Vissajjanā – kosambiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ channaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, āyasmā bhante
anya-e0905n:587_1: channo saṅghamajjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjīyamāno aññenaññaṃ paṭicari, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:589: Pucchā – ujjhāpanake khiyyanake pācittiyaṃ āvuso bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:590_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante mettiyabhūmajake bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, mettiyabhūmajakā
anya-e0905n:590_1: bhante bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ bhikkhū ujjhāpesuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:592_0: Pucchā – saṅghikaṃ āvuso mañcaṃvā pīṭhaṃvā bhisiṃvā kocchaṃvā ajjhokāse santharitvā
anya-e0905n:592_1: anuddharitvā anāpucchā pakkamantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ
anya-e0905n:593_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, sambahulā bhante
anya-e0905n:593_1: bhikkhū saṅghikaṃ senāsanaṃ ajjhokāse santharitvā anuddharitvā anāpucchā pakkamiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:595: Pucchā – saṅghike āvuso vihāre seyyaṃ santharitvā anuddharitvā anāpucchā pakkamantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:596_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sattarasavaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, sattarasavaggiyā
anya-e0905n:596_1: bhante bhikkhū saṅghike vihāre seyyaṃ santharitvā anuddharitvā anāpucchā pakkamiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:598: Vissajjanā – bhagavatā bhante vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0905n:601: Pucchā – atthi nukho āvuso ettha kocipi viraddhadoso.
anya-e0905n:604_0: Suṇātu me bhante saṅgho, ahaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ vicittasārābhivaṃsaṃ imesaṃ pannarasannaṃ
anya-e0905n:604_1: sikkhāpadānaṃ nidānādīni pucchitabbāni anekāni ṭhānāni pucchiṃ, so ca puṭṭho puṭṭho
anya-e0905n:604_2: vissajjeti, iti hidaṃ bhante nimmalaṃ suparisuddhaṃ tasseva bhagavato vacanaṃ arahato
anya-e0905n:604_3: sammāsambuddhassa, tasmā yathāpure mahākassapādayo mahātheravarā porāṇasaṃgītikārā
anya-e0905n:604_4: brahmacariyassa ciraṭṭhitiyā bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lonukampāya atthāya hitāya
anya-e0905n:604_5: sukhāya devamanussānaṃ dhammavinayaṃ saṃgāyiṃsuceva anusaṃgāyiṃsuca, evameva mayampi
anya-e0905n:604_6: dāni chaṭṭhasaṃgītimahādhammasabhā pariyāpannā yathānuppaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya imāni
anya-e0905n:606_0: Pucchā – yaṃ tena āvuso…pe… sammāsambuddhena saṅghike vihāre jānaṃ pubbupagataṃ bhikkhuṃ
anya-e0905n:606_1: anupakhajja seyyaṃ kappentassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:607: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū there bhikkhū anupakhajja seyyaṃ kappesuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:609: Pucchā – bhikkhuṃ āvuso kupitena anattamanena saṅghikā vihārā nikkaḍḍhentassa pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:610_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā
anya-e0905n:610_1: bhante bhikkhū kupitā anattamanā bhikkhū saṅghikāvihārā nikkaḍḍhiṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante
anya-e0905n:612: Pucchā – uparivehāsakuṭiyā āvuso āhaccapādakaṃ mañcaṃvā pīṭhaṃvā abhinisīdantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:613_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, aññataro bhante
anya-e0905n:613_1: bhikkhu saṅghike vihāre uparivehāsa kuṭiyā āhaccapādakaṃ mañcaṃ sahasā abhinisīdi,
anya-e0905n:615: Pucchā – dvatti pariyāye āvuso adhiṭṭhahitvā tatuttari adhiṭṭhahantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:616_0: Vissajjanā – kosambiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ channattheraṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, āyasmā
anya-e0905n:616_1: bhante chando katapariyositaṃ vihāraṃ punappunaṃ chādāpesi punappunaṃ lepāpesi, atibhārito
anya-e0905n:616_2: vihāro paripati, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:618: Pucchā – jānaṃ āvuso sappāṇakaṃ udakaṃ tiṇaṃvā mattikaṃvā siñcantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:619: Vissajjanā – āḷaviyaṃ bhante āḷavike bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, āḷavikā bhante bhikkhū jānaṃ sappāṇakaṃ udakaṃ tiṇampi mattikampi siñciṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:621: Pucchā – asammatena āvuso bhikkhuniyo ovadantassa pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:622: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū asammatā bhikkhuniyo ovadiṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:624: Pucchā – atthaṅgate āvuso sūriye bhikkhuniyo ovadantassa pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:625: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ cūḷapanthakaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, āyasmā bhante cūḷapanthako atthaṅgate sūriye bhikkhuniyo ovadi, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:627_0: Pucchā – bhikkhunupassayaṃ āvuso upasaṅkamitvā bhikkhuniyo ovadantassaca āmisahetu
anya-e0905n:627_1: therā bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo ovadantīti bhaṇantassaca pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:628_0: Vissajjanā – bhikkhunupassayaṃ upasaṅkamitvā bhikkhuniyo ovadantassa pācittiyaṃ bhante
anya-e0905n:628_1: sakkesu chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū bhikkhunupassayaṃ
anya-e0905n:628_2: upasaṅkamitvā bhikkhuniyo ovadiṃsu, āmisahetu therā bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo ovadantīti
anya-e0905n:628_3: bhaṇantassa pācittiyaṃ sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā
anya-e0905n:628_4: bhante bhikkhū āmisahetu therā bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo ovadantīti bhaṇiṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante
anya-e0905n:630: Pucchā – aññātikāya āvuso bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṃ dentassa pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:631: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, aññataro bhante bhikkhu aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṃ adāsi, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:633: Pucchā – aññātikāya āvuso bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṃ sibbentassa pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:634: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ udāyiṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, āyasmā bhante udāyī aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṃ sibbesi, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:636: Pucchā – bhikkhunayā āvuso saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajjantassa pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:637_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā
anya-e0905n:637_1: bhante bhikkhū bhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajjiṃsu, tasmiṃ
anya-e0905n:639: Pucchā – bhikkhuniyā āvuso saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaṃ nāvaṃ abhiruhantassa pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:640_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā
anya-e0905n:640_1: bhante bhikkhū bhikkhūnīhi saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaṃ nāvaṃ abhiruhiṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante
anya-e0905n:642: Pucchā – jānaṃ āvuso bhikkhuniparipācitaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjantassa pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:643: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante devadattaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, devadatto bhante jānaṃ bhikkhuniparipācitaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñji, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:645: Pucchā – bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ āvuso eko ekāya raho nisajjaṃ kappentassa pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:646: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ udāyiṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, āyasmā bhante udāyī bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ eko ekāya raho nisajjaṃ kappesi, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:648: Pucchā – tatuttari āvuso āvasathapiṇḍaṃ bhuñjantassa pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:649_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā
anya-e0905n:649_1: bhante bhikkhū anuvasitvā anuvasitvā āvasathapiṇḍaṃ paribhuñjiṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante
anya-e0905n:651: Pucchā – gaṇabhojane pācittiyaṃ āvuso bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:652: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante devadattaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, devadatto bhante sapariso kulesu viññāpetvā bhuñji, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:654: Pucchā – parampara bhojane pācittiyaṃ āvuso bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:655: Vissajjanā – vesāliyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, sambahulā bhante bhikkhū aññatra nimantitā aññatra bhuñjiṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:657: Pucchā – dvattipattapūraṃ pūvaṃ paṭiggahetvā tatuttari paṭiggaṇhantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:658: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, sambahulā bhante bhikkhū na mattaṃ jānitvā pūvaṃ paṭiggahesuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:660: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0905n:663: Pucchā – atthi nukho āvuso ettha kocipi viraddhadoso.
anya-e0905n:666_0: Pucchā – yaṃ tena sāvuso…pe… sammāsambuddhena bhuttāvinā parivātena anatirittaṃ khādanīyaṃvā
anya-e0905n:666_1: bhojanīyaṃvā bhuñjantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:667: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, sambahulā bhante bhikkhū bhuttāvī pavāritā aññatra bhuñjiṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:669: Pucchā – bhikkhuṃ āvuso bhuttāviṃ pavāritaṃ anatirittena khādanīyena bhojanīyena abhihaṭṭhuṃ pavārentassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:670_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, aññataro bhante
anya-e0905n:670_1: bhikkhu bhikkhuṃ bhuttāviṃ pavāritaṃ anatirittena bhojanīyena abhihaṭṭhuṃ pavāresi,
anya-e0905n:672: Pucchā – vikāle āvuso khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā bhuñjantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:673: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante sattarasavaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, sattarasavaggiyā bhante bhikkhū vikāle bhojanaṃ bhuñjiṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:675: Pucchā – sannidhikārakaṃ āvuso khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā bhuñjantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:676: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ belaṭṭhasīsaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, āyasmā bhante belaṭṭhasīso sannidhikārakaṃ bhojanaṃ bhuñji, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:678: Pucchā – paṇīta bhojanāni āvuso attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:679_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā
anya-e0905n:679_1: bhante bhikkhū paṇītabhojanāni attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjiṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante
anya-e0905n:681: Pucchā – adinnaṃ āvuso mukhadvāraṃ āhāraṃ āharantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:682: Vissajjanā – vesāliyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, aññataro bhante bhikkhu adinnaṃ mukhadvāraṃ āhāraṃ āhari, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:684: Pucchā – acelakassavā āvuso paribbājakassavā paribbājikāyavā sahatthā khādanīyaṃvā bhojanīyaṃvā dentassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:685_0: Vissajjanā – vesāliyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, āyasmā bhante
anya-e0905n:685_1: ānando aññatarissā paribbājikāya ekaṃ maññamāno dve pūve adāsi, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:687_0: Pucchā – bhikkhuṃ ehāvuso gāmaṃvā nigamaṃvā piṇḍāya pavisissāmāti tassa dāpetvāvā
anya-e0905n:687_1: adāpetvāvā uyyojentassa āvuso pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:688_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:688_1: āyasmā bhante upanando sakyaputto bhikkhu ehāvuso gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisissāmāti tassa
anya-e0905n:688_2: adāpetvā uyyojesi, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:690: Pucchā – sabhojane kule anupakhajja nisajjaṃ kappentassa āvuso pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:691_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:691_1: āyasmā bhante upanando sakyaputto sabhojane kule anupakhajja nisajjaṃ kappesi, tasmiṃ
anya-e0905n:693_0: Pucchā – mātugāmena saddhiṃ raho paṭicchanne āsane nisajjaṃ kappentassaca āvuso mātugāmena
anya-e0905n:693_1: saddhiṃ eko ekāya raho nisajjaṃ kappentassaca pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha
anya-e0905n:694_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:694_1: āyasmā bhante upanando sakyaputto mātugāmena saddhiṃ raho paṭicchanne āsane nisajjaṃ
anya-e0905n:694_2: kappesi, mātugāmena saddhiṃ eko ekāya raho nisajjaṃ kappesi, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:696_0: Pucchā – nimantitena āvuso sabhattena santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchā purebhattaṃvā pacchābhattaṃvā
anya-e0905n:696_1: kulesu cārittaṃ āpajjantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:697_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante āyasmantaṃ upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:697_1: āyasmā bhante upanando sakyaputto nimantito sabhatto samāno purebhattaṃ pacchābhattaṃ
anya-e0905n:697_2: kulesu cārittaṃ āpajji, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:699: Pucchā – tatuttari āvuso bhesajjaṃ viññāpentassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:700_0: Vissajjanā – sakkesu bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā bhante
anya-e0905n:700_1: bhikkhū mahānāmena sakkena ajjaṇho bhante āgametāti vuccamānā nāgamesuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante
anya-e0905n:702_0: Pucchā – uyyuttaṃ āvuso senaṃ dassanāya gacchantassa ca atirekatirattaṃ senāya vasantassa
anya-e0905n:702_1: ca uyyodhikaṃ gacchantassa ca pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:703_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā
anya-e0905n:703_1: bhante bhikkhū uyyuttaṃ senaṃ dassanāya agamaṃsu, teyeva bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhū
anya-e0905n:703_2: atirekatirattaṃ senāya vasiṃsu, teyeva bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhū uyyodhikaṃ agamaṃsu,
anya-e0905n:705: Pucchā – surāmerayapāne āvuso pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:706: Vissajjanā – kosambiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ sāgataṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, āyasmā bhante sāgato majjaṃ pivi, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:708: Pucchā – aṅgulipatodake āvuso pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:709: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū bhikkhuṃ aṅgulipatodakena hāsesuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:711: Pucchā – udake hasadhamme āvuso pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:712: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sattarasavaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, sattarasavaggiyā bhante bhikkhū aciravatiyā nadiyā udake kīḷiṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:714: Pucchā – anādariya āvuso pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:715: Vissajjanā – kosambiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ channaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, āyasmā bhante channo āpattiyā anuyuñjiyamāno anādariyaṃ akāsi, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:717: Pucchā – bhikkhuṃ bhiṃsāpentassa āvuso pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:718: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū bhikkhuṃ bhiṃsāpesuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:720: Pucchā – jotiṃ āvuso samādahitvā visibbentassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:721: Vissajjanā – bhaggesu bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, sambahulā bhante bhikkhū jotiṃ samādapetvā visibbesuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:723: Pucchā – orenaddhamāsaṃ āvuso nahāyantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:724: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, sambahulā bhante bhikkhū rājānampi passitvā na mattaṃ jānitvā nahāyiṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:726: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0905n:729: Pucchā – atthi nukho āvuso ettha kocipi viruddhadoso.
anya-e0905n:732_0: Pucchā – yaṃ tena āvuso…pe… sammāsambuddhena anādiyitvā tiṇṇaṃ dubbaṇṇakaraṇānaṃ
anya-e0905n:732_1: aññataraṃ dubbaṇṇakaraṇaṃ navaṃ cīvaraṃ paribhuñjantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:733: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, sambahulā bhante bhikkhū attano cīvaraṃ na sañjāniṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:735: Pucchā – bhikkhussa āvuso pattaṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā nisīdanaṃ vā sūcigharaṃ vā kāyabandhanaṃ vā apanidhentassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:736: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū bhikkhūnaṃ pattampi cīvarampi apanidhesuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:738: Pucchā – sañcicca āvuso pāṇaṃ jīvitā voropentassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:739: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ udāyiṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ āyasmā bhante udāyī sañcicca pāṇaṃ jīvitā voropesi, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:741: Pucchā – jānaṃ āvuso sappāṇakaṃ udakaṃ paribhuñjantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:742: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū jānaṃ sappāṇakaṃ udakaṃ paribhuñjiṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:744: Pucchā – jānaṃ āvuso theyyasatthena saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajjantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:745_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, aññataro bhante
anya-e0905n:745_1: bhikkhu jānaṃ theyyasatthena saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajji, tasmiṃ
anya-e0905n:747: Pucchā – mātugāmena saddhiṃ āvuso saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajjantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:748_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, aññataro bhante
anya-e0905n:748_1: bhikkhu mātugāmena saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajji, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:750_0: Pucchā – bhikkhūhi āvuso sahadhammikaṃ vuccamānena na tāvāhaṃ āvuso etasmiṃ sikkhāpade
anya-e0905n:750_1: sikkhissāmi, yāva na aññaṃ bhikkhuṃ byattaṃ vinayadharaṃ paripucchissāmīti bhaṇantassa
anya-e0905n:750_2: pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:751_0: Vissajjanā – kosambiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ channaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, āyasmā bhante
anya-e0905n:751_1: channo bhikkhūhi sahadhammikaṃ vuccamāno na tāvāhaṃ āvuso etasmiṃ sikkhāpade sikkhissāmi,
anya-e0905n:751_2: yāva na aññaṃ bhikkhuṃ byattaṃ vinayadharaṃ paripucchissāmīti bhaṇi, tasmiṃ bhante
anya-e0905n:753: Pucchā – vinayaṃ vivaṇṇentassa āvuso pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:754: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū vinayaṃ vivaṇṇesuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:756: Pucchā – mohanake āvuso pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:757: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū mohesuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:758: Pucchā – bhikkhussa āvuso kupitena anattamanena pahāraṃ dentassa ca talasattikaṃ uggirantassa ca pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:759_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā
anya-e0905n:759_1: bhante bhikkhū kupitā anattamanā sattarasavaggiyānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pahāraṃ adaṃsu, talasattikañca
anya-e0905n:761: Pucchā – bhikkhussa āvuso sañcicca kukkuccaṃ upadahantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:762: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū bhikkhūnaṃ sañcicca kukkuccaṃ upadahiṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:764: Pucchā – bhikkhūnaṃ āvuso bhaṇḍanajātānaṃ kalahajātānaṃ vivādā pannānaṃ upassutiṃ tiṭṭhantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:765_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā
anya-e0905n:765_1: bhante bhikkhū bhikkhūnaṃ bhaṇḍanajātānaṃ kalaha jātānaṃ vivādāpannānaṃ upassutiṃ
anya-e0905n:767: Pucchā – dhammikānaṃ āvuso kammānaṃ chandaṃ datvā pacchā khīyanadhammaṃ āpajjantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:768_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā
anya-e0905n:768_1: bhante bhikkhū dhammikānaṃ kammānaṃ chandaṃ datvā pacchā khīyanadhammaṃ āpajjiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:770: Pucchā – saṅghe āvuso vinicchakathāya vattamānāya chandaṃ adatvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkamantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:771_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, aññataro bhante
anya-e0905n:771_1: chabbaggiyo bhikkhu saṅghe vinicchayakathāya vattamānāya chandaṃ adatvā uṭṭhāyāsanā
anya-e0905n:773: Pucchā – jānaṃ āvuso saṅghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇataṃ puggalassa pariṇāmentassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:774_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā
anya-e0905n:774_1: bhante bhikkhū jānaṃ saṅghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇataṃ puggalassa pariṇāmesuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante
anya-e0905n:776: Pucchā – pubbe appaṭisaṃviditena āvuso rañño antepuraṃ pavisantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:777: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, āyasmā bhante ānando pubbe appaṭisaṃvidito rañño antepuraṃ pāvisi, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:779: Pucchā – ratanaṃ āvuso uggaṇhantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:780: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, aññataro bhante bhikkhu ratanaṃ uggahesi, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:782: Pucchā – santaṃ āvuso bhikkhuṃ anāpucchā vikāle gāmaṃ pavisantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:783_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā
anya-e0905n:783_1: bhante bhikkhū santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchā vikāle gāmaṃ pavisiṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:786: Pucchā – sekkhasammatesu āvuso kulesu khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā bhuñjantassa pāṭidesanīyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:787: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, sambahulā bhante bhikkhū namattaṃ jānitvā paṭiggahesuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:789: Pucchā – anādariyaṃ āvuso paṭicca purato vā pacchato vā olambentena nivāsentassaca pārupantassaca dukkaṭaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:790_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā
anya-e0905n:790_1: bhante bhikkhū purato ca pacchato ca olambantā nivāsesuṃceva pārupiṃsuca, tasmiṃ
anya-e0905n:791: Pucchā – anādariyaṃ āvuso paṭicca kāyaṃ vivaritvā antaraghare gacchantassa ca nisīdantassa ca dukkaṭaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:792_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggīye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā
anya-e0905n:792_1: bhante bhikkhū kāyaṃ vivaritvā antaraghare gacchiṃsu ceva nisīdiṃsuca, tasmiṃ bhante
anya-e0905n:793_0: Pucchā – anādariyaṃ āvuso paṭicca hatthaṃ vā pādaṃ vā kīḷāpentena antaraghare gacchantassa
anya-e0905n:793_1: ca nisīdantassa ca, tahaṃ tahaṃ olokentena antaraghare gacchantassa ca nisīdantassa
anya-e0905n:793_2: ca, ukkhittakāya antaraghare gacchantassa ca nisīdantassa ca dukkaṭaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:794_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā
anya-e0905n:794_1: bhante bhikkhū hatthampi pādampi kīḷāpentā tahaṃ tahaṃpi olokentā antaraghare gacchiṃsuceva
anya-e0905n:794_2: nisīdiṃsu ca, teyeva bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhū ukkhittakāya antaraghare gacchiṃsuceva
anya-e0905n:795_0: Pucchā – anādariyaṃ āvuso paṭicca ujjagghikāya vā uccāsaddaṃ mahāsaddaṃ karontena
anya-e0905n:795_1: vā antaraghare gacchantassaca nisīdantassaca dukkaṭaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha
anya-e0905n:796_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā
anya-e0905n:796_1: bhante bhikkhū mahāhasitaṃ hasantā ca uccāsaddaṃ mahāsaddaṃ karontā ca antaraghare
anya-e0905n:796_2: gacchiṃsuceva nisīdiṃsuca, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:797_0: Pucchā – anādariyaṃ āvuso paṭicca kāyappacālakaṃ vā bāhuppa cālakaṃ vā sīsappacālakaṃ
anya-e0905n:797_1: vā khambhakatena vā oguṇṭhitena vā antaraghare gacchantassa ca nisīdantassa ca ukkuṭikāya
anya-e0905n:798_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā
anya-e0905n:798_1: bhante bhikkhū kāyappacālakaṃ bāhuppacālakaṃ sīsappacālakaṃ karontā ca khambhīkatā
anya-e0905n:798_2: ca oguṇṭhitā ca antaraghare gacchiṃsuceva nisīdiṃsuca, ukkuṭikāyaca antaraghare gacchiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:799: Pucchā – anādariyaṃ āvuso paṭicca pallatthikāya antaraghare nisinnassa dukkaṭaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:800: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū pallatthikāya antaraghare nisīdiṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:801_0: Pucchā – anādariyaṃ āvuso paṭicca asakkaccaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paṭiggaṇhantassa ca tahaṃ
anya-e0905n:801_1: tahaṃ olokentena piṇḍapātaṃ paṭiggaṇhantassaca sūpaññeva bahuṃ paṭiggaṇhantassaca
anya-e0905n:801_2: thūpīkataṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paṭiggaṇhantassaca dukkaṭaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ
anya-e0905n:802_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā
anya-e0905n:802_1: bhante bhikkhū asakkaccaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paṭiggahesuṃ, tahaṃ tahaṃ olokentā piṇḍapātaṃ
anya-e0905n:802_2: paṭiggahesuṃ, sūpaññeva bahuṃ paṭiggahesuṃ, thūpīkataṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paṭiggahesuṃ, tasmiṃ
anya-e0905n:803_0: Pucchā – anādariyaṃ āvuso paṭicca āsakkaccaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjantassaca tahaṃ tahaṃ
anya-e0905n:803_1: olokentana piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjantassa ca tahaṃ tahaṃ omasitvā piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjantassa
anya-e0905n:803_2: ca sūpaññeva bahuṃ bhuñjantassa ca thūpakato omadditvā piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjantassa ca
anya-e0905n:803_3: sūpaṃ vā byañjanaṃ vā odanena paṭicchādentassa ca dukkaṭaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ
anya-e0905n:804_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā
anya-e0905n:804_1: bhante bhikkhū asakkaccaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjiṃsu, tahaṃ tahaṃ olokentā piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:804_2: teyeva bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhū tahaṃ tahaṃ omasitvā piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjiṃsu, teyeva
anya-e0905n:804_3: bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bahuṃ sūpaṃ bhuñjiṃsu, teyeva bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhū
anya-e0905n:804_4: thūpakato omadditvā piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjiṃsu, teyeva bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhū sūpampi
anya-e0905n:804_5: byañjanampi odanena paṭicchādesuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:805: Pucchā – anādariyaṃ āvuso paṭicca sūpaṃvā odanaṃvā agilānena attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjantassa dukkaṭaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:806_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā
anya-e0905n:806_1: bhante bhikkhū sūpampi odanampi attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjiṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante
anya-e0905n:807_0: Pucchā – anādariyaṃ āvuso paṭicca ujjhānasaññinā paresaṃ pattaṃ olokentassa ca atimahantaṃ
anya-e0905n:807_1: kabaḷaṃ karontassa ca dīghaṃ ālopaṃ karontassa ca dukkaṭaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ
anya-e0905n:808_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā
anya-e0905n:808_1: bhante bhikkhū ujjhānasaññino paresaṃ pattaṃ olokesuṃ, teyeva bhante chabbaggiyā
anya-e0905n:808_2: bhikkhū atimahantaṃ kabaḷaṃ kariṃsu, teyeva bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhū dīghaṃ ālopaṃ
anya-e0905n:809_0: Pucchā – anādariyaṃ āvuso paṭicca anāhaṭe kabaḷe mukhadvāraṃ vivarantassa ca bhuñjamāne
anya-e0905n:809_1: sabbaṃ hatthaṃ mukhe pakkhipantassa ca sakabaḷena mukhena byāharantassa ca piṇḍukkhepakaṃ
anya-e0905n:809_2: piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjantassa ca kabaḷāvacchedakaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjantassa ca avagaṇḍakārakaṃ
anya-e0905n:809_3: piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjantassa ca hatthaniddhunakaṃ sitthāvakārakaṃ jivhānicchārakaṃ capucapukārakaṃ
anya-e0905n:809_4: piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjantassa ca dukkaṭaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:810_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā
anya-e0905n:810_1: bhante bhikkhū anāhaṭe kabaḷe mukhadvāraṃ vivariṃsu, bhuñjamānā sabbaṃ hatthaṃ mukhe
anya-e0905n:810_2: pakkhipiṃsu, sakabaḷena mukhena byāhariṃsu, piṇḍukkhepakaṃ bhuñjiṃsu, kabaḷāvacchedakaṃ
anya-e0905n:810_3: bhuñjiṃsu, avagaṇḍakārakaṃ bhuñjiṃsu, hatthaniddhunakaṃ sitthāvakārakaṃ jivhānicchārakaṃ
anya-e0905n:810_4: capucapukārakaṃ bhuñjiṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:811_0: Pucchā – anādariyaṃ āvuso paṭicca surusurukārakaṃ bhuñjantassaca hatthanillehakaṃvā
anya-e0905n:811_1: pattanillehakaṃ vā oṭṭhanillehakaṃ vā bhuñjantassa ca sāmisena hatthena pānīyathālakaṃ
anya-e0905n:811_2: paṭiggaṇhantassa ca sasitthakaṃ pattadhovanaṃ antaraghare caḍḍentassa ca dukkaṭaṃ
anya-e0905n:811_3: kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:812_0: Vissajjanā – suru surukārakaṃ bhante bhuñjantassa dukkaṭaṃ kosambiyaṃ paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:812_1: sambahule bhante bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, sambahulā bhante bhikkhū surusurukārakaṃ
anya-e0905n:812_2: khīraṃ piviṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ. Hatthanillehakaṃ bhuñjantassa
anya-e0905n:812_3: ca pattanillehakaṃ bhuñjantassa ca oṭṭhanillehakaṃ bhuñjantassa dukkaṭaṃ sāvatthiyaṃ
anya-e0905n:812_4: paññattaṃ, chabbaggiye bhante bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū
anya-e0905n:812_5: hatthanillehakaṃ bhuñjiṃsu, pattanillehakaṃ bhuñjiṃsu, oṭṭhanillehakaṃ bhuñjiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:813_0: Sāmisena hatthena pānīyathālakaṃ paṭiggaṇhantassa ca sasitthakaṃ pattadhovanaṃ antaraghare
anya-e0905n:813_1: chaḍḍentassa ca dukkaṭaṃ bhaggesu paññattaṃ, sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:813_2: sambahulā bhikkhū sāmisena hatthena pānīyathālakaṃ paṭiggahesuṃ, teyeva bhante sambahulā
anya-e0905n:813_3: bhikkhū sasitthakaṃ pattadhovanaṃ antaraghare chaḍḍesuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:814_0: Pucchā – anādariyaṃ āvuso paṭicca chattapāṇissa dhammaṃ desentassa ca daṇḍapāṇissa
anya-e0905n:814_1: vā satthapāṇissa vā āvudhapāṇissa vā dhammaṃ desentassa ca dukkaṭaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:815_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā
anya-e0905n:815_1: bhante bhikkhū chattapāṇissa daṇḍapāṇissa satthapāṇissa āvudhapāṇissa dhammaṃ desesuṃ,
anya-e0905n:816_0: Pucchā – anādariyaṃ āvuso paṭicca pādukāruḷhassa ca upahanāruḷhassa ca yānagatassa
anya-e0905n:816_1: ca sayanagatassa ca dhammaṃ desentassa dukkaṭaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ
anya-e0905n:817_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā
anya-e0905n:817_1: bhante bhikkhū pādukāruḷhassa upahanāruḷhassa yānagatassa sayanagatassa dhammaṃ desesuṃ,
anya-e0905n:818_0: Pucchā – anādariyaṃ āvuso paṭicca pallatthikāya nisinnassa ca veṭhitasīsassa ca oguṇṭhitasīsassa
anya-e0905n:818_1: ca chamāyaṃ nisīditvā āsane nisinnassa ca nīce āsane nisīditvā ucce āsane nisinnassa
anya-e0905n:818_2: ca ṭhitena nisinnassa ca pacchato gacchantena purato gacchantassa ca uppathena gacchantena
anya-e0905n:818_3: pathena gacchantassa ca dhammaṃ desentassa dukkaṭaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha
anya-e0905n:819_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiyeva bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā
anya-e0905n:819_1: bhante bhikkhū pallatthikāya nisinnassa ca veṭhitasīsassa ca oguṇṭhitasīsassa ca
anya-e0905n:819_2: chamāyaṃ nisīditvā āsane nisinnassa ca nīce āsane nisīditvā ucce āsane nisinnassa
anya-e0905n:819_3: ca ṭhitānisinnassa ca pacchato gacchantā purato gacchantassa ca uppathena gacchantā
anya-e0905n:819_4: pathena gacchantassa ca dhammaṃ desesuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:820_0: Pucchā – anādariyaṃ āvuso paṭicca ṭhitena uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā karontassa ca harite
anya-e0905n:820_1: vā udake vā uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karontassa ca dukkaṭaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:821_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiyeva bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā
anya-e0905n:821_1: bhante bhikkhū ṭhitā uccārampi passāvampi akaṃsu, teyeva bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhū
anya-e0905n:821_2: haritepi udakepi uccārampi passāvampi kheḷampi akaṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:824: Pucchā – bhikkhunīnaṃ āvuso pañcama pārājikaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:825_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sundarīnandaṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, sundarīnandā
anya-e0905n:825_1: bhante bhikkhunī avassutā avassutassa purisapuggalassa kāyasaṃsaggaṃ sādiyi, tasmiṃ
