anya-e0905n:827: Pucchā – ussayavādikāya āvuso bhikkhuniyā aḍḍaṃ karontiyā saṅghādiseso kattha paññatto, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññatto.
anya-e0905n:828: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante tullanandaṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha paññatto, thullanandā bhante bhikkhunī ussayavādikā vihari, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññatto.
anya-e0905n:829: Pucchā – coriṃ āvuso vuṭṭhāpentiyā saṅghādiseso kattha paññatto, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññatto.
anya-e0905n:830: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante thullanandaṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha paññatto, thullanandā bhante bhikkhunī coriṃ vuṭṭhāpesi, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññatto.
anya-e0905n:831: Pucchā – ekāya āvuso gāmantaraṃ gacchantiyā saṅghādiseso kattha paññatto, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññatto.
anya-e0905n:832: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha paññatto, aññatarā bhante bhikkhunī ekā gāmantaraṃ gacchi, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññatto.
anya-e0905n:833_0: Pucchā – avassutāya āvuso bhikkhuniyā avassutassa purisapuggalassa hatthato khādanīyaṃvā
anya-e0905n:833_1: bhojanīyaṃvā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā bhuñjantassa saṅghādiseso kattha paññatto, kaṃ
anya-e0905n:834_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sundarīnandaṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha paññatto, sundarīnandā
anya-e0905n:834_1: bhante bhikkhunī avassutā avassutassa purisapuggalassa hatthato āmisaṃ paṭiggahesi
anya-e0905n:835: Pucchā – kupitāya āvuso anattamanāya bhikkhuniyā yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsantiyā na paṭinisajjantiyā saṅghādiseso kattha paññatto, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññatto.
anya-e0905n:836_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante caṇḍakāḷiṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha paññatto, caṇḍakāḷī
anya-e0905n:836_1: bhante bhikkhunī kupitā anattamanā evaṃ abhaṇi, buddhaṃ paccācikkhāmi, dhammaṃ paccācikkhāmi,
anya-e0905n:836_2: saṅghaṃ paccācikkhāmi, sikkhaṃ paccācikkhāmi, kinnumāva samaṇiyo yā samaṇiyo sakyadhītaro,
anya-e0905n:836_3: santaññāpi samaṇiyo lajjiniyo kukkuccikā sikkhākāmā, tāsāhaṃ santike brahmacariyaṃ
anya-e0905n:838: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0905n:841: Pucchā – atthi nukho āvuso ettha kocipi viraddhadoso.
anya-e0905n:845: Pucchā – yaṃ tena āvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena lakkhaṇaṃ khādantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:846_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante thullanandaṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, thullanandā
anya-e0905n:846_1: bhante bhikkhunī na mattaṃ jānitvā bahuṃ lasuṇaṃ harāpesi, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:848: Pucchā – bhikkhussa āvuso bhuñjamānassa annena vā pānena vā vidhūpanena vā upatiṭṭhantiyā bhikkhuniyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:849_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, aññatarā
anya-e0905n:849_1: bhante bhikkhunī bhikkhussa bhuñjamānassa pānīyena vidhūpanena ca upatiṭṭhati, tasmiṃ
anya-e0905n:851: Pucchā – uccāraṃvā āvuso passāvaṃvā saṅkāraṃvā vighāsaṃvā thirokuṭṭe chaḍḍentiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:852: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, aññatarā bhante bhikkhunī uccāraṃ tirokuṭṭe chaḍḍesi, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:854: Pucchā – naccaṃ vā āvuso gītaṃ vā vāditaṃ vā dassanāya gacchantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:855_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā
anya-e0905n:855_1: bhante bhikkhuniyo naccampi gītampi vāditampi dassanāya agamaṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:856: Pucchā – bhikkhupana āvuso naccaṃ vā gītaṃ vā vāditaṃ vā dassanāya gacchanto kaṃ nāma āpattiṃ āpajjati.
anya-e0905n:859: Pucchā – rattandhakāre āvuso apadīpe purisena saddhiṃ ekenekāya santiṭṭhantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:860_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, aññatarā
anya-e0905n:860_1: bhante bhikkhunī rattandhakāre apadīpe purisena saddhiṃ ekenekā santiṭṭhi, tasmiṃ
anya-e0905n:862: Pucchā – paṭicchanne vā āvuso okāse ajjhokāse vā purisena saddhiṃ ekenekāya santiṭṭhantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:863_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, aññatarā
anya-e0905n:863_1: bhante bhikkhunī paṭicchanne okāse ajjhokāse ca purisena saddhiṃ ekenekā santiṭṭhi,
anya-e0905n:865: Pucchā – duggahitena āvuso dūpadhāritena paraṃ ujjhāpentiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:866: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, aññatarā bhante bhikkhunī duggahitena dūpadhāritena paraṃ ujjhāpesi, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:868: Pucchā – attānaṃ vā āvuso paraṃ vā nirayena vā brahmacariyena vā abhisapantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:869_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante caṇḍakāḷiṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, caṇḍakāḷī
anya-e0905n:869_1: bhante bhikkhunī attānampi parampi nirayenapi brahmacariyenapi abhisapi, tasmiṃ bhante
anya-e0905n:871: Pucchā – attānaṃ āvuso vadhitvā vadhitvā rodantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:872_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante caṇḍakāḷiṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, caṇḍakāḷī
anya-e0905n:872_1: bhante bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ bhaṇḍitvā attānaṃ vadhitvā vadhitvā rodi, tasmiṃ
anya-e0905n:874_0: Pucchā – bhikkhuniyā āvuso cīvaraṃ visibbetvā vā visibbāpetvā vā neva sibbentiyā
anya-e0905n:874_1: na sibbāpanāya ussukkaṃ karontiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ
anya-e0905n:875_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante thullanandaṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, thullanandā
anya-e0905n:875_1: bhante bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṃ visibbāpetvā neva sibbesi na sibbāpanāya ussukkaṃ
anya-e0905n:877: Pucchā – agārikassa vā āvuso paribbājakassa vā paribbājikāya vā samaṇacīvaraṃ dentiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:878: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante thullanandaṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, thullanandā bhante bhikkhunī agārikassa samaṇacīvaraṃ adāsi, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:880: Pucchā – dvinnaṃ āvuso bhikkhunīnaṃ ekamañce vā ekattharaṇapāvuraṇe vā tuvaṭṭentīnaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:881_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṃ, sambahulā
anya-e0905n:881_1: bhante bhikkhuniyo dve ekamañce tuvaṭṭesuṃ, ekattharaṇapāvuraṇe tuvaṭṭesuṃ, tasmiṃ
anya-e0905n:883: Pucchā – bhikkhuniyā āvuso sañcicca aphāsuṃ karontiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:884: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante thullanandaṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, thullanandā bhante bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyā sañcicca aphāsuṃ akāsi, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:886: Pucchā – dukkhitaṃ āvuso sahajīviniṃ neva upaṭṭhentiyā na upaṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṃ karontiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:887_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante thullanandaṃyeva bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, thullanandā
anya-e0905n:887_1: bhante bhikkhunī dukkhitaṃ sahajīviniṃ nevaupaṭṭhesi na upaṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṃ akāsi,
anya-e0905n:889: Pucchā – bhikkhuniyā āvuso upassayaṃ datvā kupitāya anattamanāya nikkaḍḍhantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:890_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante thullanandaṃyeva bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, thullanandā
anya-e0905n:890_1: bhante bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyā upassayaṃ datvā kupitā anattamanā nikkaḍḍhi, tasmiṃ
anya-e0905n:892: Pucchā – saṃsaṭṭhāya āvuso bhikkhuniyā yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:893: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante caṇḍakāḷiṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, caṇḍakāḷī bhante bhikkhunī saṃsaṭṭhā vihari, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:895: Pucchā – antoraṭṭhe vā āvuso tiroraṭṭhe vā sāsaṅkasammate sappaṭibhaye asatthikāya cārikaṃ carantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:896_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṃ, sambahulā
anya-e0905n:896_1: bhante bhikkhuniyo antoraṭṭhepi tiroraṭṭhepi sāsaṅkasammate sappaṭibhaye asatthikāyo
anya-e0905n:896_2: cārikaṃ cariṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:898: Pucchā – antovassaṃ āvuso cārikaṃ carantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:899: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṃ, sambahulā bhante bhikkhuniyo antovassaṃ cārikaṃ pakkamiṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:901: Pucchā – vassaṃ vuṭṭhāya āvuso bhikkhuniyā cārikaṃ na pakkamantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:902: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbhaṃ paññattaṃ, sambahulā bhante bhikkhuniyo vassaṃvuṭṭhā cārikaṃ na pakkamiṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:904: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0905n:909_0: Pucchā – yaṃ tena āvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena rājāgāraṃ vā cittāgāraṃ vā
anya-e0905n:909_1: ārāmaṃ vā uyyānaṃ vā pokkharaṇiṃ vā dassanāya gacchantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:910_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā
anya-e0905n:910_1: bhante bhikkhuniyo rājāgārampi cittāgārampi dassanāya gacchiṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:912: Pucchā – gihiveyyāvaccaṃ āvuso karontiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:913: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṃ, sambahulā bhante bhikkhuniyogihi veyyāvaccaṃ akaṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:915: Pucchā – agārikassa vā āvuso paribbājakassa vā paribbājikāya vā sahatthā khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ dentiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:916_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante thullanandaṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, thullanandā
anya-e0905n:916_1: bhante bhikkhunī agārikassa sahatthā khādanīyampi bhojanīyampi adāsi, tasmiṃ bhante
anya-e0905n:918: Pucchā – tiracchānavijjaṃ āvuso pariyāpuṇantiyā ca vācentiyā ca pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:919_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā
anya-e0905n:919_1: bhante bhikkhuniyo tiracchānavijjaṃ pariyāpuṇiṃsuceva vācesuñca, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:920: Pucchā – bhikkhu pana āvuso tādisaṃ tiracchānavijjaṃ pariyāpuṇanto ca vācento ca kiṃ nāma āpattiṃ āpajjati.
anya-e0905n:923: Pucchā – jānaṃ āvuso sabhikkhukaṃ ārāmaṃ anāpucchā pavisantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:924: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṃ, sambahulā bhante bhikkhuniyo ārāmaṃ anāpucchā pavisiṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:926: Pucchā – bhikkhuṃ āvuso akkosantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:927: Vissajjanā – vesāliyaṃ bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhuniyo āyasmantaṃ upāliṃ akkosiṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:929: Pucchā – caṇḍikatāya āvuso gaṇaṃ paribhāsantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:930: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante thullanandaṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, thullanandā bhante bhikkhunī caṇḍikatāya gaṇaṃ paribhāsi, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:932: Pucchā – kulaṃ āvuso maccharāyantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:933: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, aññatarā bhante bhikkhunī kulaṃ maccharāyi, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:935: Pucchā – abhikkhuke āvuso āvāse vassaṃ vasantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:936: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṃ, sambahulā bhante bhikkhuniyo abhikkhuke āvāse vassaṃ vasiṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:938: Pucchā – vassaṃ vuṭṭhāya āvuso bhikkhuniyā ubhatosaṅghe tīhi ṭhānehi na pavārentiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:939: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṃ, sambahulā bhante bhikkhuniyo vassaṃ vuṭṭhā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ na pavāresuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:941: Pucchā – ovādāya vā āvuso saṃvāsāya vā nagacchantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:942: Vissajjanā – sakkesu bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhuniyo ovādaṃ nagacchiṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:944: Pucchā – uposathampi āvuso na pucchantiyā ovādampi na yācantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:945_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṃ, sambahulā
anya-e0905n:945_1: bhante bhikkhuniyo uposathaṃ na pucchiṃsu, ovādampi na yāciṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:947: Pucchā – gabbhiniṃ vā āvuso pāyantiṃ vā vuṭṭhāpentiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:948_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṃ, sambahulā
anya-e0905n:948_1: bhante bhikkhuniyo gabbhiniṃ vuṭṭhāpesuṃ, pāyantiṃ vuṭṭhāpesuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:950: Pucchā – dve vassāni āvuso chasu dhammesu asikkhitasikkhaṃ sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpentiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:951_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṃ, sambahulā
anya-e0905n:951_1: bhante bhikkhuniyo dve vassāni chasu dhammesu asikkhitasikkhaṃ sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpesuṃ,
anya-e0905n:953: Pucchā – purisasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ āvuso kumārakasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ caṇḍiṃ sokāvāsaṃ sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpentiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:954_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante thullanandaṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, thullanandā
anya-e0905n:954_1: bhante bhikkhunī purisasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ kumārakasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ caṇḍiṃ sokāvāsaṃ caṇḍakāḷiṃ
anya-e0905n:954_2: sekkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpesi, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:956: Pucchā – mātāpitūhi vā āvuso sāmikena vā ananuññātaṃ sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpentiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:957_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante thullanandaṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, thullanandā
anya-e0905n:957_1: bhante bhikkhunī mātāpitūhipi sāmikenapi ananuññātaṃ sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpesi, tasmiṃ
anya-e0905n:959: Pucchā – chattupāhanaṃ āvuso dhārentiyā ca yānena yāyantiyā ca pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:960_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā
anya-e0905n:960_1: bhante bhikkhuniyo chattupāhanaṃ dhāresuṃ, yānena yāyiṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:962: Pucchā – itthālaṅkāraṃ āvuso dhārentiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:963: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhuniyo itthālaṅkāraṃ dhāresuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:964: Pucchā – bhikkhu pana āvuso purisālaṅkāraṃ dhārento kiṃ nāma āpattiṃ āpajjeyya.
anya-e0905n:967: Pucchā – gandhavaṇṇakena āvuso nahāyantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:968: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhuniyo gandhavaṇṇakena nahāyiṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:970: Pucchā – bhikkhussa āvuso purato anāpucchā āsane nisīdantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:971_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṃ, sambahulā
anya-e0905n:971_1: bhante bhikkhuniyo bhikkhussa purato anāpucchā āsane nisīdiṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:973: Pucchā – anokāsakataṃ āvuso bhikkhuṃ pañhaṃ pucchantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:974: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṃ, sambahulā bhante bhikkhuniyo anokāsakataṃ bhikkhuṃ pañhaṃ pucchiṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:975_0: Pucchā – sappiṃ vā āvuso telaṃ vā madhuṃ vā phāṇitaṃ vā macchaṃ vā maṃsaṃ vā khīraṃ
anya-e0905n:975_1: vā dadhiṃ vā viññāpetvā bhuñjantiyā pāṭidesanīyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ
anya-e0905n:976_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā
anya-e0905n:976_1: bhante bhikkhuniyo sappimpi telampi madhumpi phāṇitampi macchampi maṃsampi khīrampi
anya-e0905n:976_2: dadhimpi viññāpetvā bhuñjiṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:977: Pucchā – catunnaṃ āvuso vipattīnaṃ katamā vipatti.
anya-e0905n:979: Pucchā – channaṃ āvuso āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti.
anya-e0905n:980_0: Vissajjanā – catūhi bhante samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti, siyā kāyato samuṭṭhāti, navācato
anya-e0905n:980_1: nacittato, siyā kāyato ca vācato ca samuṭṭhāti, nacittato, siyā kāyato ca cittato
anya-e0905n:980_2: ca samuṭṭhāti, navācato, siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, imehi bhante
anya-e0905n:986: Vissajjanā – na evarūpaṃ karissāmīti yāvajīvaṃ āpāṇakoṭikaṃ samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu, ayaṃ bhante paṭipatti.
anya-e0905n:988: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0905n:994: Pucchā – ubhato vibhaṅgānantaraṃ āvuso porāṇakehi saṃgītikāramahātherehi kaṃ nāma pāvacanaṃ saṃgītaṃ.
anya-e0905n:995: Vissajjanā – ubhato vibhaṅgānantaraṃ bhante porāṇakehi saṃgītikāramahātherehi khandhakā saṃgītā.
anya-e0905n:996: Pucchā – te pana āvuso khandhakā vaggabhedena katividhā.
anya-e0905n:997: Vissajjanā – te pana bhante khandhakā duvidhā vaggabhedena mahāvaggo cūḷavaggoti.
anya-e0905n:998: Pucchā – mahāvagge āvuso kati khandhakā pariyāpannā.
anya-e0905n:999_0: Vissajjanā – mahāvagge bhante dasakhandhakā pariyāpannā, seyyathidaṃ, mahākhandhako
anya-e0905n:1000: Pucchā – mahākhandhake āvuso bahū kathāyo, katamā tāsaṃ ādikathā.
anya-e0905n:1004: Pucchā – tasmātiha āvuso tato paṭṭhāya taṃ pucchissāmi, bhagavā āvuso paṭhamābhisambuddhakāle kattha kīvacīraṃ kenākārena vihāsi.
anya-e0905n:1005: Vissajjanā – bhagavā bhante paṭhamābhisambuddho bodhirukkhamūle sattāhaṃ ekapallaṅkena vihāsi vimuttisukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedī.
anya-e0905n:1006: Pucchā – tadā āvuso bhagavā kīdisaṃ dhammaṃ manasikatvā kīdisaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
anya-e0905n:1007: Vissajjanā – tadā bhante bhagavā rattiyā paṭhamaṃ yāmaṃ rattiyā majjhimaṃ yāmaṃ rattiyā pacchimaṃ yāmaṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṃ anulomaṃ paṭilomaṃ manasikatvā tīṇi udānāni udānesi.
anya-e0905n:1009: Pucchā – tassa āvuso sattāhassa accayena bhagavā kattha vihāsi.
anya-e0905n:1010: Vissajjanā – tassa bhante sattāhassa accayena bhagavā ajapāla nigrodhamūle vihāsi, sattāhaṃ ekapallaṅkena vihāsi vimuttisukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedī.
anya-e0905n:1012: Pucchā – tassapi āvuso sattāhassa accayena bhagavā kattha vihāsi.
anya-e0905n:1013: Vissajjanā – tassa bhante sattāhassa accayena bhagavā mucalindamūle sattāhaṃ ekapallaṅkena nisīdi.
anya-e0905n:1014: Pucchā – tassapi āvuso sattāhassa accayena bhagavā kattha vihāsi.
anya-e0905n:1015: Vissajjanā – tassapi bhante sattāhassa accayena bhagavā rājāyatanamūle sattāhaṃ ekapallaṅkena nisīdi vimuttisukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedī.
anya-e0905n:1016: Pucchā – tassapi āvuso sattāhassa accayena bhagavā kattha vihāsi.
anya-e0905n:1017: Vissajjanā – tassa bhante sattāhassa accayena bhagavā punadeva ajapālanigrodhamūle vihāsi.
anya-e0905n:1018: Pucchā – tasmiṃ pana āvuso ajapālanigrodhe viharantassa bhagavato kathaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi.
anya-e0905n:1019: Vissajjanā – tasmiṃ pana bhante ajapālanigrodhe viharantassa bhagavato rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa dhammagambhīratāpaṭisaṃyutto cetaso parivitakko udapādi.
anya-e0905n:1020: Adhigato kho myāyaṃ dhammo gambhīro duddaso aranubodho santo paṇīto atakkāvacarā nipuṇo paṇḍitavedanīyo.
anya-e0905n:1023: Pucchā – kathaṃ āvuso tadā dhammadesanāya brahmayācanā ca bhagavato paṭiññāca ahosi.
anya-e0905n:1024_0: Vissajjanā – desetu bhante bhagavā dhammaṃ, desetu sugato dhammaṃ, santi sattā apparajakkhajātikā
anya-e0905n:1024_1: assavanatā dhammassa parihāyanti, bhavissanti dhammassa aññātāroti iti bhante brahmuno
anya-e0905n:1029: Evaṃ kho bhante bhagavato dhammadesanāya paṭiññā ca ahosi.
anya-e0905n:1034: Pucchā – evaṃ kho āvuso bhagavā dhammadesanāya paṭiññaṃ katvā paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ desento kattha kīdisaṃ dhammaṃ kassa desesi.
anya-e0905n:1035: Vissajjanā – bārāṇasiyaṃ bhante isipatane migadāye pañcavaggiya bhikkhupamukhānaṃ brahmagaṇānaṃ dhammacakkapavattanasuttaṃ desesi.
anya-e0905n:1036: Pucchā – tasmiṃ kho pana āvuso dhammacakkapavattanasutte desiyamāne manussaloke kassa dhammābhisamayo ahosi.
anya-e0905n:1037: Vissajjanā – āyasmato bhante koṇḍaññassa dhammābhisamayo ahosi.
anya-e0905n:1038: Pucchā – kathaṃ nu kho āvuso imasmiṃ buddhasāsane paṭhamaṃ pabbajjā ca upasampadā ca ahosi.
anya-e0905n:1039: Vissajjanā – imasmiṃ bhante buddhasāsane paṭhamaṃ ehibhikkhupasampadā ahosi.
anya-e0905n:1040: Labheyyāhaṃ bhante bhagavato santike pabbajaṃ, labheyyaṃ upasampadaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1041: Ehi bhikkhu svākhāto dhammo, cara brahmacariyaṃ sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāya.
anya-e0905n:1042: Pucchā – itaresaṃ pana āvuso catunnaṃ pañcavaggiyānaṃ kadā dhammābhisamayo ahosi.
anya-e0905n:1043_0: Vissajjanā – pāṭipade bhante divase āyasmato vappassa, dutiye bhante divase āyasmato
anya-e0905n:1043_1: bhaddiyassa, tatiye bhante divase āyasmato mahānāmassa, catutthe bhante divase āyasmato
anya-e0905n:1044: Pucchā – sabbesampi āvuso tesaṃ pañcavaggiyānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kadā arahattapatti hoti.
anya-e0905n:1045: Vissajjanā – sabbesampi bhante tesaṃ pañcavaggiyānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pakkhassa pañcamiyaṃ anattalakkhaṇasutte desiyamāne arahattapatti hoti.
anya-e0905n:1046: Pucchā – kadā āvuso bhagavatā bhikkhū tattha tattha cārikaṃ caritvā dhammadesanatthāya pesitā.
anya-e0905n:1047: Vissajjanā – yasappamukhānaṃ bhante catupaññāsa sahāyakānaṃ pabbajitakāle bhagavatā bhikkhū tattha tattha cārikaṃ caritvā dhammadesanatthāya pesitā.
anya-e0905n:1049: Pucchā – kadā āvuso bhagavatā tīhi saraṇagamanehi pabbajjūpa sampadā anuññāto ahosi.
anya-e0905n:1050_0: Vissajjanā – yasappamukhānaṃ bhante catupaññāsāya gihi sahāyakānaṃ pabbajitvā tattha
anya-e0905n:1050_1: tattha cārikaṃ caritvā dhammadesanatthāya pesitakāle bhagavatā tīhi saraṇagamanehi
anya-e0905n:1051: Anujānāmi bhikkhave tumheva dāni tāsu tāsu disāsu tesu tesu janapadesu pabbājetha upasampādetha.
anya-e0905n:1052: Pucchā – bhagavatā āvuso bhikkhūnaṃ ārāmo paṭiggaṇhituṃ kattha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ anuññāto.
anya-e0905n:1053_0: Vissajjanā – bhagavatā bhante bhikkhūnaṃ ārāmaṃ paṭiggaṇhituṃ rājagahe anuññāto,
anya-e0905n:1053_1: rājā bhante māgadho seniyo bimbisāro buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa veḷuvanaṃ
anya-e0905n:1053_2: uyyānaṃ adāsi, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ anuññāto.
anya-e0905n:1054: Etāhaṃ bhante veḷuvanaṃ uyyānaṃ buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa dammi –
anya-e0905n:1056: Pucchā – kathañca āvuso dvinnaṃ aggasāvakānaṃ pabbajjūpasampadā ahosi.
anya-e0905n:1057: Vissajjanā – dvinnaṃ bhante aggasāvakānaṃ ehi bhikkhupasampadā ahosi.
anya-e0905n:1064: Ye dhammā hetuppabhavā, tesaṃ hetuṃ tathāgato;
anya-e0905n:1065: Āha tesañca yo nirodho, evaṃ vādī mahāsamaṇo.
anya-e0905n:1067: Ete bhikkhave dve sahāyakā āgacchanti kolito upatisso ca etaṃ me sāvakayugaṃ bhavissati aggaṃ bhaddayugaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1068: Labheyyāma mayaṃ bhante bhagavato santike pabbajjaṃ labheyyāma upasampadaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1069: Etha bhikkhavo svākhāto dhammo, caratha brahmacariyaṃ sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāya.
anya-e0905n:1070: Pucchā – upajjhāyo āvuso gaṇhituṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññāto, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ anuññāto.
anya-e0905n:1071_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññāto, sambahulā bhante
anya-e0905n:1071_1: bhikkhū anupajjhāyakā anācariyakā anovadiyamānā ananusāsiyamānā dunnivatthā duppārutā
anya-e0905n:1071_2: anokappasampannā piṇḍāya cariṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ anuññāto.
anya-e0905n:1072: Pucchā – upajjhāyamhi āvuso na sammāvattantassa dukkaṭaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1073: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante sambahule saddhivihārike ārabbha paññattaṃ, sambahulā bhante saddhivihārikā upajjhāyamhi na sammāvattiṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1074: Pucchā – kadā āvuso bhagavatā tīhi saraṇagamanehi upasampadaṃ paṭikkhipitvā ñāticatutthena kammena upasampadā anuññātā.
anya-e0905n:1075: Vissajjanā – rādhabrāhmaṇassa bhante pabbajitakāle bhagavatā tīhi saraṇagamanehi upasampadaṃ paṭikkhipitvā ñātticatutthena kammena upasampadā anuññātā.
anya-e0905n:1076: Konu kho bhikkhave tassa brāhmaṇassa adhikāraṃ sarati.
anya-e0905n:1077: Ahaṃ kho bhante tassa brāhmaṇassa adhikāraṃ sarāmi.
anya-e0905n:1078: Sādhu sādhu sāriputta, kataññuno hi sāriputta sappurisā katavedino.
anya-e0905n:1080: Yāsā bhikkhave mayā tīhi saraṇagamanehi upasampadāanuññātā, taṃ ajjatagge paṭikkhipāmi.
anya-e0905n:1082: Pucchā – ayācitakaṃ āvuso upasampadāpekkhaṃ upasampādentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1083: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, aññataro bhante bhikkhu upasampannasamanantaraṃ anācāraṃ acari, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1084: Pucchā – catunnaṃ āvuso nissayānaṃ ācikkhaṇā bhagavatā kattha anuññātā, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ anuññātā.
anya-e0905n:1085: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha anuññātā, aññataro bhante bhikkhu udarassa kāraṇā pabbaji, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ anuññātā.
anya-e0905n:1087: Kathañhi nāma bhikkhu evaṃ svākkhāte dhammavinaye udarassa kāraṇā pabbajissati.
anya-e0905n:1088: Pucchā – ūnadasavassena āvuso upasampādentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1089_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante āyasmantaṃ upasenaṃ vaṅgantaputtaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1089_1: āyasmā bhante upaseno vaṅgantaputto ekavasso saddhivihārikaṃ upasampādesi, tasmiṃ
anya-e0905n:1090: Pucchā – bālena āvuso abyattena upasampādentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1091_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, sambahulā bhante
anya-e0905n:1091_1: bhikkhū “dasavassamhā dasavassamhā”ti bālā abyattā upasampādesuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1092: Pucchā – ācariyo āvuso gaṇhituṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññāto, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ anuññāto.
anya-e0905n:1093_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññāto, sambahulā bhante
anya-e0905n:1093_1: bhikkhū upajjhāyesu pakkantesupi vibbhantesupi kālaṅkatesupi pakkhasaṅkantesupi anācariyakā
anya-e0905n:1093_2: anovadiyamānā ananusāsiyamānā dunnivatthā duppārutā anākappasampannā piṇḍāya cariṃsu,
anya-e0905n:1094: Pucchā – pañcahi āvuso ābādhehi phuṭṭhaṃ pabbājentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1095: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, sambahulā bhante bhikkhū pañcahi ābādhehi phuṭṭhaṃ pabbājesuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1096: Sādhu bhante ayyā pañcahi ābādhehi phuṭṭhaṃ na pabbājeyyuṃ…
anya-e0905n:1097: Pucchā – rājabhaṭaṃ āvuso pabbājentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1098: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, sambahulā bhante bhikkhū rājabhaṭe pabbājesuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1099: Pucchā – dhajabandhaṃ āvuso coraṃ pabbājentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1100: Vissajjanā – rājagaheyeva bhante aṅgulimālaṃ coraṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, aṅgulimālo bhante coro bhikkhūsu pabbajito hoti, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1101: Pucchā – kārabhedakaṃ āvuso coraṃ pabbājentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1102: Vissajjanā – rājagaheyeva bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, sambahulā bhante bhikkhū kārabhedakacoraṃ pabbājesuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1103: Pucchā – iṇāyikaṃ āvuso pabbājentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1104: Vissajjanā – rājagaheyeva bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, sambahulā bhante bhikkhū iṇāyikaṃ pabbājesuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1105: Pucchā – dāsaṃ āvuso pabbajentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1106: Vissajjanā – rājagaheyeva bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, sambahulā bhante bhikkhū dāsaṃ pabbājesuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1107: Pucchā – bhaṇḍukammāya āvuso apalokanaṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1108_0: Vissajjanā – rājagaheyeva bhante aññataraṃ kammārabhaṇḍuputtaṃ ārabbha anuññātaṃ
anya-e0905n:1108_1: aññataro bhante kammārabhaṇḍuputto mātāpitūhi saddhiṃ bhaṇḍitvā bhikkhūsu pabbajito
anya-e0905n:1109: Pucchā – ūnavīsativassassa āvuso puggalassa upasampadā bhagavatā kattha paṭikkhittā, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paṭikkhittā.
anya-e0905n:1110: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paṭikkhittā, sambahulā bhante bhikkhū ūnavīsativassaṃ puggalaṃ upasampādesuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paṭikkhittā.
anya-e0905n:1111: Na bhikkhave jānaṃ ūnavīsativasso puggalo upasampādetabbo, youpasampādeyya, yathādhammo kāretabbo.
anya-e0905n:1112: Pucchā – mātāpitūhi āvuso ananuññātaṃ puttaṃ pabbājentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1113_0: Vissajjanā – sakkesu bhante paññattaṃ, rājā bhante suddhodano bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā
anya-e0905n:1113_1: varaṃ yāci, sādhu bhante ayyāananuññātaṃ mātāpitūhi puttaṃ pabbājeyyunti, tasmiṃ
anya-e0905n:1114: Na bhikkhave ananuññāto mātāpitūhi putto pabbājetabbo, yo pabbājeyya, āpattidukkaṭassa.
anya-e0905n:1115: Pucchā – theyyasaṃvāsakassa āvuso upasampadā bhagavatā kattha paṭikkhittā, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paṭikkhittā.
anya-e0905n:1116_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ purāṇakulaputtaṃ ārabbha paṭikkhittā, aññataro
anya-e0905n:1116_1: bhante purāṇakulaputto khīṇa kolañño sāmaṃ pattacīvaraṃ paṭiyādetvā kesamassuṃ ohāretvā
anya-e0905n:1116_2: kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā ārāmaṃ gantvā bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ saṃvasi, bhante vatthusmiṃ paṭikkhittā.
anya-e0905n:1117: Pucchā – tiracchānagatassa āvuso upasampadā bhagavatā kattha paṭikkhittā, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paṭikkhittā.
anya-e0905n:1118_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ nāgaṃ ārabbha paṭikkhittā, aññataro bhante
anya-e0905n:1118_1: nāgo māṇavakavaṇṇena bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā pabbajjaṃ yāci, taṃ bhikkhū pabbājesuṃ
anya-e0905n:1119: Pucchā – mātughātakassa ca āvuso pitughātakassa ca upasampadā bhagavatā kattha paṭikkhittā, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paṭikkhittā.
anya-e0905n:1120_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃyeva bhante aññataraṃ māṇavakaṃ ārabbha paṭikkhittā, aññataro
anya-e0905n:1120_1: ca bhante māṇavako aññataro ca māṇavako mātaraṃ jīvitā voropesi pitaraṃ jīvitā voropesi,
anya-e0905n:1121: Mātughātako bhikkhave anupasampanno naupasampādetabbo, upasampanno nāsetabbo, pitughātako bhikkhave anupasampanno naupasampādetabbo, upasampanno nāsetabbo.
anya-e0905n:1122: Pucchā – apattacīvarakaṃ vā āvuso yācitapattacīvarakaṃ vā upasampādentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1123_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, sambahulā bhante
anya-e0905n:1123_1: bhikkhū apattacīvarakaṃ upasampādesuṃ, yācitakena pattacīvarena upasampādesuṃ, tasmiṃ
anya-e0905n:1124: Pucchā – upasampadaṃ pucchissaṃ, sanidānaṃ sauddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n:1125: Vissajjanā – upasampadaṃ vissajjissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ bhante dve āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n:1127: Pucchā – cātuddase ca āvuso pannarase ca pakkhassa ca aṭṭhamiyā sannipatitvā dhammaṃ bhāsituṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ, kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1128_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātā, sambahulā bhante
anya-e0905n:1128_1: bhikkhū cātuddesa pannarase aṭṭhamiyā ca pakkhassa sannipatitvā tuṇhī nisīdiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:1129: Anujānāmi bhikkhave cātuddase pannarase aṭṭhamiyā ca pakkhassa sannipatituṃ.
anya-e0905n:1131: Pucchā – kadā āvuso bhikkhūnaṃ pātimokkhuddeso bhagavatā anuññāto.
anya-e0905n:1132_0: Vissajjanā – yadā bhante bhagavato rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṃ cetaso parivitakko
anya-e0905n:1132_1: udapādi “yaṃnūnāhaṃ yāni mayā bhikkhūnaṃ paññattāni sikkhāpadāni, tāni nesaṃ pātimokkhuddesaṃ
anya-e0905n:1132_2: anujāneyyaṃ, so nesaṃ bhavissati uposathakamma”nti tadā bhante bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ
anya-e0905n:1133: Pucchā – sīmaṃ āvuso sammanituṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ, kismiñca vatthusmiṃ anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1134_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante anuññātaṃ, rājagahe bhante bhagavati viharati bhikkhūnaṃ
anya-e0905n:1134_1: etadahosi “bhagavatā paññattaṃ ettāvatā sāmaggī, yāvatā ekāvāsoti kittāvatānukho
anya-e0905n:1134_2: ekāvāso hotī”ti, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1135: Pucchā – kati āvuso uposathā divasavasena ca kārakapuggalavasena ca kātabbākāravasena ca.
anya-e0905n:1136: Vissajjanā – divasavasena bhante tayo uposathā, puggalavasena ca bhante tayo uposathā, kātabbākāravasena ca bhante tayo uposathā.
anya-e0905n:1137: Pucchā – kati āvuso uposathakammāni tesu ca kīdisaṃ uposathakammaṃ bhagavatā anuññātaṃ, kīdisaṃ ananuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1138_0: Vissajjanā – cattārimāni bhante uposathakammāni, adhammena vaggaṃ uposathakammaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1138_1: adhammena samaggaṃ uposathakammaṃ, dhammena vaggaṃ uposathakammaṃ, dhammena samaggaṃ
anya-e0905n:1138_2: uposathakammaṃ. Tatra bhante yadidaṃ adhammena vaggaṃ uposathakammaṃ, adhammena samaggaṃ
anya-e0905n:1138_3: uposathakammaṃ dhammena vaggaṃ uposathakammaṃ, evarūpaṃ bhante uposathakammaṃ ananuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1138_4: tatra bhante yadidaṃ dhammena samaggaṃ uposathakammaṃ, evarūpaṃ bhante uposathakammaṃ anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1139: Pucchā – uposathaṃ pucchissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n:1140: Vissajjanā – uposathaṃ vissajjissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ bhante tisso āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n:1142: Pucchā – vassūpanāyikaṃ āvuso bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1143: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante sambahulā bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, sambahulā bhante bhikkhū hemantampi gimhampi vassampi cārikaṃ cariṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1145_0: Vissajjanā – dvemā bhante vassūpanāyikā bhagavatā anuññātā purimikā pacchimikā, aparajjugatāya
anya-e0905n:1145_1: bhante āsaḷhiyā purimikā upagantabbā, māsagatāya bhante āsaḷhiyā pacchimikā upagantabbā,
anya-e0905n:1145_2: imā kho bhante dve vassūpanāyikā bhagavatā anuññātā.
anya-e0905n:1146: Pucchā – vassaṃ āvuso upagantvā purimaṃ vā temāsaṃ pacchimaṃ vā temāsaṃ avasitvā cārikaṃ pakkamantassa dukkaṭaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1147_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā bhante
anya-e0905n:1147_1: bhikkhū vassaṃ upagantvā antarā vassaṃ cārikaṃ pakkamiṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1148: Pucchā – sattāha karaṇīyena āvuso pahite gantuṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1149: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṃ, sambahulā bhante bhikkhū udenena upāsakena pahite na gacchiṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1150: Pucchā – sattāhakaraṇīyena āvuso sattannaṃ apahitepi gantuṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1151: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññatarassa bhikkhuno mātugilāna vatthusmiṃ anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1152: Anujānāmi bhikkhave sattannaṃ sattāhakaraṇīyena apahitepi gantuṃ, pageva pahite.
anya-e0905n:1153: Pucchā – kismiṃci āvuso antarāye sati antovassaṃ pakkamituṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1154_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṃ, sambahulā bhante
anya-e0905n:1154_1: bhikkhū kosalesu janapadesu vassaṃ upagacchiṃsu, te vassūpagatā vāḷehi ubbāḷhā ahesuṃ,
anya-e0905n:1155: Pucchā – rukkha susire vā āvuso rukkhaviṭabhiyā vā ajjhokāse vā vassaṃ upagacchantassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1156_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, sambahulā bhante
anya-e0905n:1156_1: bhikkhū rukkhasusirepi rukkhaviṭabhiyāpi ajjhokāsepi vassaṃ upagacchiṃsu, tasmiṃ
anya-e0905n:1157: Pucchā – asenāsanikena āvuso vassaṃ upagacchantassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1158: Vissajjanā – tasmiṃyeva bhante sāvatthiyaṃ sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, sambahulā bhante bhikkhū asenāsanikā vassaṃ upagacchiṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1159: Pucchā – chavakuṭikāya vā āvuso chatte vā cāṭiyā vā vassaṃ upagacchantassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1160_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃyeva bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, sambahulā
anya-e0905n:1160_1: bhante bhikkhū chavakuṭikāyapi chattepi cāṭiyāpi vassaṃ upagacchiṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante
anya-e0905n:1161: Pucchā – paṭissavaṃ āvuso visaṃ vādentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1162_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1162_1: āyasmā bhante upanando sakyaputto rañño pasenadissa kosalassa vassaṃ vāsaṃ paṭissuṇitvā
anya-e0905n:1163: Pucchā – vassūpanāyikaṃ pucchissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n:1164: Vissajjanā – vassūpanāyikaṃ vissajjissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ bhante ekā āpatti.
anya-e0905n:1166: Pucchā – vassaṃ vuṭṭhānaṃ āvuso bhikkhūnaṃ tīhi ṭhānehi pavārituṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1167_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṃ, sambahulā bhante
anya-e0905n:1167_1: bhikkhū sandiṭṭhā sambhattā antovassaṃ neva ālapiṃsu na sallapiṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante
anya-e0905n:1168: Anujānāmi bhikkhave vassaṃ vuṭṭhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ tīhi ṭhānehi pavāretuṃ, diṭṭheva vā sutena vā parisaṅkāya vā.
anya-e0905n:1169: Pucchā – kati āvuso pavāraṇā divasavasena ca puggalavasena ca kātabbākāravasena ca.
anya-e0905n:1170: Vissajjanā – divasavasena bhante tisso pavāraṇā, tathā puggalavasena kātabbākāravasenaca.
anya-e0905n:1171: Pucchā – katīnaṃ āvuso saṅghe pavāretuṃ bhagavatā anuññātaṃ, katīnaṃ panāvuso aññamaññaṃ pavāretuṃ bhagavatā anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1172: Vissajjanā – pañcannaṃ bhante bhikkhūnaṃ saṅghe pavāretuṃ bhagavatā anuññātaṃ, catunnaṃ vā bhante tiṇṇaṃ vā dvinnaṃ vā aññamaññaṃ pavāretuṃ anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1173: Pucchā – ekena panāvuso vassaṃvuṭṭhena bhikkhunā kathaṃ paṭipajjitabbanti bhagavatā anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1174: Vissajjanā – ekena pana bhante bhikkhunā “ajja me pavāraṇā”ti adhiṭṭhātabbanti bhagavatā anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1175: Pucchā – pavāraṇaṃ pucchissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n:1176: Vissajjanā – pavāraṇaṃ vissajjissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ bhante tisso āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n:1179: Pucchā – upāhanaṃ āvuso bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1180_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante āyasmantaṃ soṇaṃ ārabbha anuññātaṃ, āyasmato bhante
anya-e0905n:1180_1: soṇassa accāraddhavīriyassa caṅkamato pādā bhijjiṃsu, caṅkamo lohitena phuṭo ahosi,
anya-e0905n:1181_0: Pucchā – sabbanīlikā vā āvuso sabbapītikā vā sabbalohitikā vā sabbamañjiṭṭhikā vā
anya-e0905n:1181_1: sabbakaṇhā vā sabbamahāraṅgarattā vā sabbamahānāmarattā vā upāhanāyo dhārentassa
anya-e0905n:1181_2: dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1182_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā bhante
anya-e0905n:1182_1: bhikkhū sabbanīlikāyo upāhanāyo dhāresuṃ, sabbapītikāyo sabbalohitikāyo sabbamañjiṭṭhikāyo
anya-e0905n:1182_2: sabbakaṇhāyo sabbamahāraṅgarattā sabbamahānāmarattāyopi upāhanāyo dhāresuṃ, tasmiṃ
anya-e0905n:1183_0: Pucchā – khallakabandhā vā āvuso puṭabandhā vā pāliguṇṭhimā vā tūlapuṇṇikā vā tittirapattikā
anya-e0905n:1183_1: vā meṇḍavisāṇavaddhikā vā ajavisāṇavaddhikā vā vicchikāḷikā vā morapiñcha parisibbikā
anya-e0905n:1183_2: vā citrā vā upāhanāyo dhārentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha
anya-e0905n:1184_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā bhante
anya-e0905n:1184_1: bhikkhū khallakabandhā upāhanāyopi dhāresuṃ, puṭabandhā upāhanāyopi dhāresuṃ, pāliguṇṭhimā
anya-e0905n:1184_2: upāhanāyopi dhāresuṃ, tūlapuṇṇikā upāhanāyopi dhāresuṃ, tittirapattikā upāhanāyopi
anya-e0905n:1184_3: dhāresuṃ, meṇḍavisāṇavaddhikā upāhanāyopi dhāresuṃ, ajavisāṇavaddhikā upāhanāyopi
anya-e0905n:1184_4: dhāresuṃ, vicchikāḷikā upāhanāyopi dhāresuṃ, morapiñcha parisibbitā upāhanāyo dhāresuṃ,
anya-e0905n:1184_5: citrā upāhanāyopi dhāresuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1185: Pucchā – kaṭṭhapādukāyo āvuso dhārentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1186_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante chabbaggīyeva bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā
anya-e0905n:1186_1: bhante bhikkhū rattiyā paccūsasamayaṃ paccuṭṭhāya kaṭṭhapādukāyo abhiruhitvā ajjhokāse
anya-e0905n:1186_2: caṅkamanti uccāsaddā mahāsaddā khaṭakhaṭasaddā anekavihitaṃ tiracchānakathaṃ kathentā,
anya-e0905n:1187: Pucchā – yānena āvuso yāyantassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1188: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū yānena yāyiṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1189: Pucchā – gilānassa āvuso yānaṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1190_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ gilānaṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha anuññātaṃ, aññataro
anya-e0905n:1190_1: bhante bhikkhu kosalesu janapade sāvatthiṃ gacchanto bhagavantaṃ dassanāya antarāmagge
anya-e0905n:1190_2: gilāno kukkuccāyanto yānaṃ nābhiruhi, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1191: Pucchā – uccāsayanamahāsayanāni āvuso dhārentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1192: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū uccāsayanamahāsayanāni dhāresuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1193: Pucchā – gocammāni āvuso dhārentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1194: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ pāpabhikkhuṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, aññataro bhante bhikkhu pāṇātipāte samādapesi, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1195_0: Pucchā – paccantimesu āvuso janapadesu vinayadharapañcamena gaṇena upasampadā ca
anya-e0905n:1195_1: guṇaṅguṇūpahanañca dhuvanahānañca cammāni attharaṇāni ca nissīmagatānaṃ cīvaradānañcāti
anya-e0905n:1195_2: imāni pañca bhagavatā kattha anuññātāni, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ anuññātāni.
anya-e0905n:1196_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ soṇaṃ kuṭikaṇṇaṃ ārabbha anuññātā, āyasmā
anya-e0905n:1196_1: bhante soṇo kuṭikaṇṇo etāni pañcavatthūni āyasmato mahākaccānassa vacanena bhagavantaṃ
anya-e0905n:1197: Pucchā – cammasaññuttaṃ pucchissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n:1198: Vissajjanā – cammasaññuttaṃ vissajjissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ bhante tisso āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n:1200: Pucchā – pañca āvuso bhesajjāni paṭiggahetvā kālepi vikālepi paribhuñjituṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1201_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṃ, sambahulānaṃ
anya-e0905n:1201_1: bhante bhikkhūnaṃ sāradikena ābādhena puṭṭhānaṃ yāgupi na sammā pariṇāmaṃ gacchi,
anya-e0905n:1201_2: bhattampi bhuttaṃ na sammā pariṇāmaṃ gacchi, te tena kisā ahesuṃ lūkhā dubbaṇṇā uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajātā
anya-e0905n:1202: Pucchā – mūlādibhesajjāni āvuso bhagavatā kattha anuññātāni, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ anuññātāni.
anya-e0905n:1203: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule gilāne bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātāni, sambahulānaṃ gilānānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ mūlehi bhesajjehi attho ahosi, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ anuññātāni.
anya-e0905n:1204: Pucchā – antovuṭṭhaṃvā āvuso antopakkaṃ vā sāmaṃpakkaṃ vā paribhuñjantassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1205_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, āyasmā bhante
anya-e0905n:1205_1: ānando sāmaṃ tilampi taṇḍulampi muggampi viññāpetvā anto vāsetvā anto sāmaṃ paci,
anya-e0905n:1207: Pucchā – manussamaṃsaṃ āvuso paribhuñjantassa thullaccayañca appaṭivekkhitvā maṃsaṃ paribhuñjantassa dukkaṭañca bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1208: Vissajjanā – bārāṇasiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, aññataro bhante bhikkhu appaṭivekkhitvā manussamaṃsaṃ bhuñji, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1209: Na bhikkhave manussamaṃsaṃ paribhuñjitabbaṃ, yo paribhuñjeyya, āpatti thullaccayassa, na ca bhikkhave appaṭivekkhitvā maṃsaṃ paribhuñjitabbaṃ, yo paribhuñjeyya āpatti dukkaṭassa.
anya-e0905n:1210: Pucchā – hatthimaṃsaṃ vā āvuso assamaṃsaṃ vā paribhuñjantassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1211: Vissajjanā – bārāṇasiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, sambahulā bhante bhikkhū hatthimaṃsampi assamaṃsampi paribhuñjiṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1212: Pucchā – sunakkhamaṃsaṃ vā āvuso ahimaṃsaṃ vā bhuñjantassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1213: Vissajjanā – bārāṇasiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, sambahulā bhante bhikkhū sunakkhamaṃsampi ahimaṃsampi paribhuñjiṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1214_0: Pucchā – sīhamaṃsaṃ vā āvuso byagghamaṃsaṃ vā dīpimaṃsaṃ vā acchamaṃsaṃ vā taracchamaṃsaṃ
anya-e0905n:1214_1: vā bhuñjantassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1215_0: Vissajjanā – bārāṇasiyaṃyeva bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, sambahulā
anya-e0905n:1215_1: bhante bhikkhū sīhamaṃsampi byagghamaṃsampi dīpimaṃsampi acchamaṃsampi taracchamaṃsampi
anya-e0905n:1216: Pucchā – gilānassa āvuso guḷaṃ vā agilānassa guḷodakaṃ vā bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1217_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṃ, sambahulā bhante
anya-e0905n:1217_1: bhikkhū gilānasseva bhagavatā guḷo anuññāto no agilānassāti kukkuccāyantā guḷaṃ na
anya-e0905n:1218: Pucchā – jānaṃ āvuso uddissa kataṃ maṃsaṃ paribhuñjantassa dukkaṭaṃ paññapetvā tikoṭiparisuddhaṃ maṃsaṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1219: Vissajjanā – vesāliyaṃ bhante sīhassa seṭāpatino vatthusmiṃ anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1221_0: Pucchā – pātheyyaṃ āvuso pariyesituñca kappiyakārakānaṃ hatthe upanikkhittahiraññato
anya-e0905n:1221_1: nibbattaṃ kappiyapaccayaṃ sādituñca bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ
anya-e0905n:1222_0: Vissajjanā – antarā ca bhante bhaddiyaṃ antarā ca aṅguttarāpaṃ meṇḍakaṃ gahapatiṃ
anya-e0905n:1222_1: ārabbha anuññātaṃ, meṇḍako bhante gahapati bhagavantaṃ yāci “santi bhante maggā kantārā
anya-e0905n:1222_2: appodakā appabhakkhā na sukarā apātheyyena gantuṃ, sādhu bhante bhagavā bhikkhūnaṃ
anya-e0905n:1222_3: pātheyyaṃ anujānātū”ti, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1224: Pucchā – aṭṭha āvuso pānāni bhagavatā kattha anuññātāni, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ anuññātāni.
anya-e0905n:1225: Vissajjanā – āpaṇe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātāni, sambahulā bhante bhikkhū kukkuccāyantā pānāni na paṭiggaṇhiṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ anuññātāni.
anya-e0905n:1227: Pucchā – sabbañca āvuso ḍākaṃ sabbañca piṭṭhakhādanīyaṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1228_0: Vissajjanā – kusinārāyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṃ, sambahulā bhante
anya-e0905n:1228_1: bhikkhū kukkuccāyantā ḍākañca piṭṭhakhādanīyañca na paṭiggahesuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1229: Pucchā – akappiyaṃ āvuso samādapentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1230: Vissajjanā – ātumāyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ vuḍḍhapabbajitaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, aññataro bhante vuḍḍhapabbajito akappiye samādapeti, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1231: Pucchā – saṅghikāni vā āvuso puggalikāni vā bījāni puggalikāya vā saṅghikāya vā bhūmiyā ropitāni bhāgaṃ datvā paribhuñjituṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ, kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1232_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante anuññātaṃ, sāvatthiyaṃ bhante bhagavati viharati
anya-e0905n:1232_1: saṅghikānipi bījāni puggalikāya bhūmiyā ropiyiṃsu, puggalikānipi bījāni saṅghikāya
anya-e0905n:1232_2: bhūmiyā ropiyiṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1233: Pucchā – vinayamahāpadesasaṅkhātāni āvuso cattāri kappiyākappiyaanulomāni bhagavatā kattha paññattāni, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattāni.
anya-e0905n:1234: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattāni, sambahulānaṃ bhante bhikkhūnaṃ kismiñci kismiñciṭhāne kukkuccaṃ uppajji, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattāni.
anya-e0905n:1235: Pucchā – yāvakālikādīhi saṃsaṭṭhānaṃ āvuso yāmakālikādīnaṃ paribhogakālamariyādaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1236_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, sambahulānaṃ
anya-e0905n:1236_1: bhante bhikkhūnaṃ etadahosi “kappati nukho yāvakālikena yāmakālikaṃ sattāhakālikaṃ
anya-e0905n:1236_2: yāvajīvikaṃ, na nukho kappati. Kappatinukho yāmakālikena sattāhakālikaṃ yāvajīvikaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1236_3: na nukho kappati. Kappati nukho sattāhakālikena yāvajīvikaṃ, na nukho kappatī”ti.
anya-e0905n:1237: Pucchā – bhesajjakaṃ pucchissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n:1238: Vissajjanā – bhesajjakaṃ vissajjissaṃ sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ bhante tisso āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n:1240: Pucchā – vassaṃvuṭṭhānaṃ āvuso bhikkhūnaṃ kathinaṃ attharituṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1241_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante tiṃsamatte pāveyyake bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṃ, tiṃsamattā
anya-e0905n:1241_1: bhante pāveyyakā bhikkhū sāvatthiṃ āgacchantā bhagavantaṃ dassanāya upakaṭṭhāya vassūpanāyikāya
anya-e0905n:1241_2: nāsakkhiṃsu sāvatthiyaṃ vassūpanāyikaṃ sambhāvetuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1242: Pucchā – kathinakaṃ pucchissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n:1243: Vissajjanā – kathinakaṃ vissajjissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ bhante na katamā āpatti.
anya-e0905n:1246: Pucchā – gahapaticīvaraṃ āvuso sādiyituṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1247_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante jīvakaṃ komārabhaccaṃ ārabbha anuññātaṃ, jīvako bhante
anya-e0905n:1247_1: komārabhacco bhikkhūnaṃ gahapaticīvaraṃ anujānituṃ bhagavantaṃ yāci, tasmiṃ bhante
anya-e0905n:1248: Pucchā – cha āvuso rajanāni bhagavatā kattha anuññātāni, kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ anuññātāni.
anya-e0905n:1249_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātāni, sambahulā bhante
anya-e0905n:1249_1: bhikkhū chakaṇenapi paṇḍumattikāyapi cīvaraṃ rajiṃsu, cīvaraṃ dubbaṇṇaṃ hoti, tasmiṃ
anya-e0905n:1250: Pucchā – acchinnakāni āvuso cīvarāni dhārentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1251: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, sambahulā bhante bhikkhū acchinnakāni cīvarāni dhāresuṃ dantakasāvāni, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1252: Pucchā – kadā āvuso bhagavā anuññāsi chinnakaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ chinnakaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ chinnakaṃ antaravāsakaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1253: Vissajjanā – dakkhiṇāgirito bhante pacchāgatakāle bhagavā anuññāsi chinnakaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ chinnakaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ chinnakaṃ antaravāsakaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1254: Pucchā – aggaḷaṃ ca āvuso tunnañca ovaṭṭikañca kaṇḍusakañca daḷhīkammañca bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1255: Vissajjanā – bārāṇasiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha anuññātaṃ, aññataro bhante bhikkhu aggaḷaṃ acchupesi, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1256_0: Pucchā – vassikasāṭikā ca āvuso āgantukabhattañca gamikabhattañca gilānabhattañca
anya-e0905n:1256_1: gilānupaṭṭhākabhattañca gilānabhesajjañca dhuvayāgu ca bhikkhunisaṅghassa udakasāṭikācāti
anya-e0905n:1256_2: imā aṭṭha bhagavatā kattha anuññātā, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ anuññātā.
anya-e0905n:1257: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante visākhaṃ migāramātaraṃ ārabbha anuññātā, visākhā bhante migāramātā bhagavantaṃ aṭṭhavarāni yāci, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ anuññātā.
anya-e0905n:1258: Pucchā – bhagavatā āvuso mātāpitūnaṃ dānaṃ anujānitvā saddhādeyyaṃ vinipātentassa dukkaṭaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1259_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, aññatarassa
anya-e0905n:1259_1: bhante bhikkhuno bahuṃ cīvaraṃ uppannaṃ ahosi, so ca taṃcīvaraṃ mātāpitūnaṃ dātukāmo
anya-e0905n:1260: Mātāpitaroti kho bhikkhave dadamāne kiṃ vadeyyāma, anujānāmi bhikkhave mātāpitūnaṃ dātuṃ, na ca bhikkhave saddhādeyyaṃ vinipātetabbaṃ, yo vinipāteyya āpatti dukkaṭassa –
anya-e0905n:1261: Pucchā – aññatra vassaṃ vuṭṭhena āvuso aññatra cīvarabhāgaṃ sādiyantassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1262_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1262_1: āyasmā bhante upanando sakyaputto aññatra vassaṃ vuṭṭho aññatra cīvarabhāgaṃ sādiyi,
anya-e0905n:1263: Pucchā – anāthakaṃ āvuso bhikkhuṃ gilānaṃ na upaṭṭhahantassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1264_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, bhagavati bhante
anya-e0905n:1264_1: sāvatthiyaṃ viharati aññatarassa bhikkhuno kucchivikārābādho ahosi, so sake muttakarīse
anya-e0905n:1264_2: palipanno sayi, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1265: Pucchā – naggiyaṃ āvuso titthiyasamādānaṃ samādiyantassa thullaccayaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1266: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, aññataro bhante bhikkhu naggiyaṃ titthiyasamādānaṃ samādiyi, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1267_0: Pucchā – sabbanīlakāni vā āvuso cīvarāni sabbapītakāni vā sabbalohitakāni vā sabbamañjiṭṭhakāni
anya-e0905n:1267_1: vā sabbakaṇhānivāti evarūpāni cīvarāni dhārentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1268: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū sabbanīlakādīni cīvarāni dhāresuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1269: Pucchā – kañcukaṃ vā āvuso veṭhanaṃ vā dhārentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1270: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiyeva bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū kañcukampi dhāresuṃ veṭhanampi dhāresuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1271: Pucchā – cīvarasaññuttaṃ pucchissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n:1272: Vissajjanā – cīvarasaññuttaṃ vissajjissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ bhante tisso āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n:1274: Pucchā – suddhaṃ āvuso bhikkhuṃ anāpattikaṃ avatthusmiṃ akāraṇe ukkhipantassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1275_0: Vissajjanā – campāyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, bhagavati bhante
anya-e0905n:1275_1: campāyaṃ viharati sambahulā bhikkhū kāsīsu vāsabhagāme suddhaṃ kassapagottaṃ bhikkhuṃ
anya-e0905n:1275_2: anāpattikaṃ avatthusmiṃ akāraṇe ukkhipiṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1276: Pucchā – campeyyakaṃ pucchissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n:1277: Vissajjanā – campeyyakaṃ vissajjissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ bhante ekā āpatti.
anya-e0905n:1279_0: Pucchā – bhedagarukehi bhikkhave bhikkhūhi na so bhikkhu āpattiyā adassane ukkhipitabboti
anya-e0905n:1279_1: ca, bhedagarukena bhikkhave bhikkhunā paresampi saddhāya āpattidesetabbāti ca āvuso
anya-e0905n:1279_2: ayaṃ sāmaggirasaovādo bhagavatā kattha dinno, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ dinno.
anya-e0905n:1280_0: Vissajjanā – kosambiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha dinno, bhagavati bhante
anya-e0905n:1280_1: kosambiyaṃ viharati aññataro bhikkhu āpattiṃ āpanno ahosi, so tassā āpattiyā āpatti
anya-e0905n:1280_2: diṭṭhi ahosi, aññe bhikkhū tassā āpattiyā anāpatti diṭṭhino ahesuṃ. So aparena samayena
anya-e0905n:1280_3: tassā āpattiyā anāpattidiṭṭhi ahosi, aññe bhikkhū tassā āpattiyā āpattidiṭṭhino ahesuṃ.
anya-e0905n:1280_4: Atha kho te bhante bhikkhū sāmaggiṃ labhitvā taṃ bhikkhuṃ āpattiyā adassane ukkhipiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:1281_0: Pucchā – saṅghabhedassa āvuso mūlabhūte bhikkhumhi ukkhittake osārite tassa vatthussa
anya-e0905n:1281_1: vūpasamāya saṅghasāmaggiñca kātuṃ sāmaggī uposathañca kātuṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1282_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante teyeva ukkhittakānuvattake bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1282_1: te bhante ukkhittakānuvattakā bhikkhū taṃ ukkhittakaṃ bhikkhuṃ osāretvā yena ukkhepakā
anya-e0905n:1282_2: bhikkhū tenupasaṅkamiṃsu upasaṅkamitvā te ukkhepake bhikkhū ekadavocuṃ “yasmiṃ āvuso
anya-e0905n:1282_3: vatthusmiṃ ahosi saṅghassa bhaṇḍanaṃ kalaho viggaho vivādo saṅghabhedo saṅgharāji
anya-e0905n:1282_4: saṅghavavatthānaṃ saṅghanānākaraṇaṃ, so eso bhikkhuṃ āpanno ca ukkhitto ca passi
anya-e0905n:1282_5: ca osārito ca, handa mayaṃ āvuso tassa vatthussa vūpasamāya saṅghasāmaggiṃ karomā”ti,
anya-e0905n:1283: Pucchā – kosambakaṃ pucchissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n:1284: Vissajjanā – kosambakaṃ vissajjissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ bhante ekā āpatti.
anya-e0905n:1287: Pucchā – bhaṇḍanādikārakassa āvuso bhikkhuno tajjanīyakammaṃ kātuṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1288_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante paṇḍukalohitake bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṃ, paṇḍukalohitakā
anya-e0905n:1288_1: bhante bhikkhū attanā bhaṇḍanakārakā kalahakārakā vivādakārakā bhassakārakā saṅghe
anya-e0905n:1288_2: adhikaraṇakārakā, yepi caññe bhikkhū bhaṇḍanakārakā kalahakārakā vivādakārakā bhassakārakā
anya-e0905n:1288_3: saṅghe adhikaraṇakārakā te upasaṅkamitvā evamāhaṃsu “mā kho tumhe āyasmanto eso ajesi,
anya-e0905n:1288_4: balavābalavaṃ paṭimantetha, tumhe tena paṇḍitatarā ca byattatarā ca bahussutatarā
anya-e0905n:1288_5: ca alamattatarā ca, mā cassa bhāyittha, mayampi tumhākaṃ pakkhā bhavissāmā”ti, tena
anya-e0905n:1288_6: anuppannāni ceva bhaṇḍanāni uppajjanti, uppannāni ca bhaṇḍanāni bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya
anya-e0905n:1289: Pucchā – tajjanīyakammakatassa āvuso bhikkhuno katisu vattesu sammā vattantassa taṃ kammaṃ paṭippassambhetuṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1290_0: Vissajjanā – aṭṭhārasasu bhante vattesu sammā vattantassa tajjanīyakammakatassa bhikkhuno
anya-e0905n:1290_1: taṃ kammaṃ paṭippassambhetuṃ bhagavatā sāvatthiyaṃ anuññātaṃ, teyeva paṇḍukalohitakā
anya-e0905n:1290_2: bhikkhū saṅghena tajjanīyakammakatā sammā vattitvā saṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā yāciṃsu,
anya-e0905n:1291_0: Pucchā – bālassa āvuso abyattassa āpattibahulassa anapadānassa gihisaṃsaṭṭhassa ananulomikehi
anya-e0905n:1291_1: gihisaṃsaggehi niyassakammaṃ kātuṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1292_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ seyyasakaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, āyasmā bhante
anya-e0905n:1292_1: seyyasako bālo ahosi abyatto āpattibahulo anapadāno gihisaṃsaṭṭho vihāsi ananulomikehi
anya-e0905n:1293: Pucchā – niyassakammakatassa āvuso bhikkhuno katisu vattesu sammā vattantassa taṃ kammaṃ paṭippassambhetuṃ bhagavatā anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1294_0: Vissajjanā – aṭṭhārasasu bhante vattesu sammā vattantassa niyassa kammakatassa bhikkhuno
anya-e0905n:1294_1: taṃ kammaṃ paṭippassambhetuṃ bhagavatā anuññātaṃ, na upasampādetabbaṃ, na nissayo
anya-e0905n:1294_2: dātabbo, na sāmaṇero upaṭṭhāpetabbo, na bhikkhunovādakasammuti sāditabbā, sammatenapi
anya-e0905n:1294_3: bhikkhuniyo na ovaditabbā, evamādīsu bhante aṭṭhārasasu vattesu sammā vattantassa
anya-e0905n:1294_4: niyassakammakatassa bhikkhuno taṃ kammaṃ paṭippassambhetuṃ bhagavatā anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1295: Pucchā – kuladūsakassa āvuso pāpasamācārassa bhikkhuno pabbājanīyakammaṃ kātuṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1296_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante assajipunabbasuke bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṃ, assajipunabbasukā
anya-e0905n:1296_1: bhante bhikkhū kīṭāgirismiṃ kuladūsakā ahesuṃ pāpasamācārā, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1297_0: Pucchā – paṭisāraṇīyakammaṃ āvuso pucchāmi, saddhaṃ āvuso pasannaṃ gahapatiṃ dāyakaṃ
anya-e0905n:1297_1: kārakaṃ saṅghupaṭṭhākaṃ hīnena khuṃsentassa bhikkhuno paṭisāraṇīyakammaṃ kātuṃ bhagavatā
anya-e0905n:1297_2: kattha anuññātaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1298_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ sudhammaṃ ārabbha anuññātaṃ, bhagavati
anya-e0905n:1298_1: bhante sāvatthiyaṃ viharati āyasmā sudhammo macchikāsaṇḍe cittaṃ gahapatiṃ saddhaṃ
anya-e0905n:1298_2: pasannaṃ dāyakaṃ kārakaṃ saṅghupaṭṭhākaṃ hīnena khuṃsesi hīnena vambhesi, tasmiṃ
anya-e0905n:1299: Tenahi bhikkhave saṅgho sudhammassa bhikkhuno paṭisāraṇīyakammaṃ karotu “citto te gahapati khamāpetabbo”ti –
anya-e0905n:1300_0: Pucchā – paṭisāraṇīyakammakatassa āvuso bhikkhuno anudūtaṃ dātuñca tena anudūtena
anya-e0905n:1300_1: saddhiṃ gantvā yathākhuṃsitaṃ gahapatiṃ khamāpetuṃ ca bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1301_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃyeva sudhammaṃ ārabbha anuññātaṃ, āyasmā
anya-e0905n:1301_1: bhante sudhammo macchikāsaṇḍaṃ gantvā maṅkubhūto nāsakkhi cittaṃ gahapatiṃ khamāpetuṃ,
anya-e0905n:1302: Pucchā – paṭisāraṇīyakammakatassa āvuso bhikkhuno katisu vattesu sammā vattantassa taṃ kammaṃ paṭippassambhetuṃ bhagavatā anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1303: Vissajjanā – aṭṭhārasasu bhante vattesu sammā vattantassa paṭisāraṇīya kammakatassa bhikkhuno taṃ kammaṃ paṭippassambhetuṃ bhagavatā anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1304_0: Pucchā – āpattiṃ āvuso āpajjitvā taṃ āpattiṃ passituṃ vā paṭikātuṃ vā na icchantassa
anya-e0905n:1304_1: bhikkhuno āpattiyā adassane vā appaṭikamme vā ukkhepanīyakammaṃ kātuṃ bhagavatā kattha
anya-e0905n:1304_2: paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1305_0: Vissajjanā – kosambiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ channattheraṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, āyasmā
anya-e0905n:1305_1: bhante channo āpattiṃ āpajjitvā na icchi taṃ āpattiṃ passituṃ vā paṭikātuṃ vā, tasmiṃ
anya-e0905n:1306: Pucchā – āpattiyā āvuso adassanena vā appaṭikamme vā ukkhepanīya kammakatena bhikkhunā katisu vattesu sammā vattitabbaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1307: Vissajjanā – tecattālīsāya bhante vattesu sammā vattitabbaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1308: Pucchā – ukkhepanīyakammakatassa āvuso bhikkhuno sammā vattantassa taṃ kammaṃ paṭippassambhetuṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1309_0: Vissajjanā – kosambiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃyeva channaṃ ārabbha anuññātaṃ, āyasmā bhante
anya-e0905n:1309_1: channo saṅghena āpattiyā adassane vā appaṭikamme vā ukkhepanīyakammakato sammā vattesi
anya-e0905n:1309_2: lomaṃpātesi netthāraṃ vattesi saṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā tassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiyā
anya-e0905n:1310_0: Pucchā – pāpikaṃ āvuso diṭṭhiṃ gahetvā taṃ diṭṭhiṃ na paṭinissajjantassa pāpikāya
anya-e0905n:1310_1: diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge ukkhepanīyakammaṃ kātuṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha
anya-e0905n:1311_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante ariṭṭhaṃ bhikkhuṃ gaddhabādhipubbaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1311_1: bhagavati bhante sāvatthiyaṃ viharati ariṭṭhassa nāma bhikkhuno gaddhabādhipubbassa
anya-e0905n:1311_2: evarūpaṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ uppannaṃ ahosi “tathāhaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi,
anya-e0905n:1311_3: yathāyeme antarāyikā dhammā vuttā bhagavatā, te paṭisevato nālaṃ antarāyāyā”ti, tasmiṃ
anya-e0905n:1312: Pucchā – pāpikāya āvuso diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge ukkhepanīyakammakatena bhikkhunā katisu vattesu sammā vattitabbaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1313: Vissajjanā – tecattālīsāya bhante vattesu sammā vattitabbaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1314: Pucchā – kammakkhandhakaṃ pucchissaṃ, sanidāni saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n:1315: Vissajjanā – kammakkhandhakaṃ vissajjissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ bhante ekā āpatti.
anya-e0905n:1317: Pucchā – pārivāsikassa āvuso pakatattānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ abhivādanādīni sādiyantassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1318_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante pārivāsike bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, pārivāsikā
anya-e0905n:1318_1: bhante bhikkhū sādiyiṃsu pakatattānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ abhivādanādīni, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1319: Pucchā – pārivāsikena āvuso bhikkhunā katisu vattesu sammā vattitabbaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1320: Vissajjanā – pārivāsikena bhante bhikkhunā catunavutiyā vattesu sammā vattitabbaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1321: Pucchā – pārivāsikaṃ pucchissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n:1322: Vissajjanā – pārivāsikaṃ vissajjissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ bhante ekā āpatti.
anya-e0905n:1324: Pucchā – samuccayaṃ pucchissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n:1325: Vissajjanā – samuccayaṃ vissajjissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ bhante ekā āpatti.
anya-e0905n:1327_0: Pucchā – asammukhībhūtānaṃ āvuso bhikkhūnaṃ tajjanīyaṃ vā niyassaṃ vā pabbājanīyaṃ
anya-e0905n:1327_1: vā paṭisāraṇīyaṃ vā ukkhepanīyaṃ vā kammaṃ karontassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1328_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā
anya-e0905n:1328_1: bhante bhikkhū asammukhībhūtānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kammaṃ akaṃsu tajjanīyampi niyassampi
anya-e0905n:1328_2: pabbājanīyampi paṭisāraṇīyampi ukkhepanīyampi, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1329: Pucchā – sativepullapattassa āvuso bhikkhuno sativinayaṃ dānaṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1330_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante mettiyabhūmajake bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṃ mettiyabhūmajakā
anya-e0905n:1330_1: bhante bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ amūlikāya sīlavipattiyā anuddhaṃsesuṃ,
anya-e0905n:1332_0: Vissajjanā – pañcimāni bhante dhammikāni sativinayassa dānāni, suddho hoti bhikkhu
anya-e0905n:1332_1: anāpattiko, anuvadanti ca naṃ, yācati ca, tassa saṅgho sativinayaṃ deti dhammena
anya-e0905n:1332_2: samaggena, imāni kho bhante pañca dhammikāni sati vinayassa dānāni.
anya-e0905n:1333: Pucchā – amūḷhassa āvuso bhikkhuno amūḷhavinayaṃ dātuṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1334_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṃ, sambahulā bhante
anya-e0905n:1334_1: bhikkhū gaggaṃ bhikkhuṃ ummattakena cittavipariyāsakatena ajjhāciṇṇena āpattiyā codesuṃ
anya-e0905n:1334_2: “saratā yasmā evarūpiṃ āpattiṃ āpajjitā”ti, so evaṃ vadeti “ahaṃ kho āvuso ummattako
anya-e0905n:1334_3: ahosi cittavipariyāsakato, tena me ummattakena cittavipariyāsakatena bahuṃ assāmaṇakaṃ
anya-e0905n:1334_4: ajjhāciṇṇaṃ bhāsitaparikkantaṃ, nāhaṃ taṃ sarāmi, mūḷhena me etaṃ kata”nti. Evampi
anya-e0905n:1334_5: naṃ vuccamānā codenteva “saratā yasmā evarūpiṃ āpattiṃ āpajjitā”ti, tasmiṃ bhante
anya-e0905n:1335: Pucchā – kati āvuso adhammikāni amūḷhavinayassa dānāni, vibhajitvā kathehi.
anya-e0905n:1336_0: Vissajjanā – tīṇi bhante adhammikāni amūḷhavinayassa dānāni, idha bhante bhikkhu
anya-e0905n:1336_1: āpattiṃ āpanno hoti, tamenaṃ codeti saṅgho vā sambahulā vā ekapuggalo vā “saratāyasmā
anya-e0905n:1336_2: evarūpiṃ āpattiṃ āpajjitā”ti, so saramānova evaṃ vadeti “na kho ahaṃ āvuso sarāmi
anya-e0905n:1336_3: evarūpiṃ āpattiṃ āpajjitā”ti. Añño saramānova evaṃ vadeti “sarāmi kho ahaṃ āvuso
anya-e0905n:1336_4: yathā supinantenā”ti. Añño anummattakova ummattakālayaṃ karoti “ahampi kho evaṃ karomi,
anya-e0905n:1336_5: tumhepi evaṃ karotha, mayhampi etaṃ kappati, tumhākampetaṃ kappatī”ti. Esaṃ saṅgho
anya-e0905n:1336_6: amūḷhavinayaṃ deti, adhammikaṃ bhante amūḷhavinayassa dānaṃ. Imāni kho bhante tīṇi
anya-e0905n:1337: Pucchā – kati āvuso dhammikāni amūḷhavinayassa dānāni, vibhajitvā kathehi.
anya-e0905n:1338_0: Vissajjanā – tīṇi bhante dhammikāni amūḷhavinayassa dānāni, idha bhante bhikkhu ummattako
anya-e0905n:1338_1: hoti cittavipariyāsakato tena ummattakena cittavipariyāsakatena bahuṃ assāmaṇakaṃ
anya-e0905n:1338_2: ajjhāciṇṇaṃ hoti bhāsitaparikkantaṃ, tamenaṃ codeti saṅgho vā sambahulā vā ekapuggalo
anya-e0905n:1338_3: vā “saratāyasmā evarūpiṃ āpattiṃ āpajjitā”ti, so assaramānova evaṃ vadeti “na kho
anya-e0905n:1338_4: ahaṃ āvuso sarāmi evarūpiṃ āpattiṃ āpajjitā”ti. Aññopi assaramānova evaṃ vadeti “sarāmi
anya-e0905n:1338_5: kho ahaṃ āvuso yathā supinantenā”ti. Aññopi ummattakova ummattakālayaṃ karoti “ahampi
anya-e0905n:1338_6: evaṃ karomi, tumhepi evaṃ karotha, mayhampi etaṃ kappati, tumhākampetaṃ kappatī”ti.
anya-e0905n:1338_7: Esaṃ bhante tiṇṇaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ saṅgho amūḷhavinayaṃ deti, dhammikaṃ bhante amūḷhavinayassa
anya-e0905n:1338_8: dānaṃ. Imāni kho bhante tīṇi dhammikāni amūḷhavinayassa dānāni.
anya-e0905n:1339: Pucchā – appaṭiññāya āvuso bhikkhūnaṃ tajjanīyādīni kammāni karontassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1340_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā bhante
anya-e0905n:1340_1: bhikkhū appaṭiññāya bhikkhūnaṃ kammāni akaṃsu tajjanīyādīni, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1341: Pucchā – kathaṃ āvuso adhammikaṃ hoti paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1342: Vissajjanā – aññathā bhante āpattiṃ āpajjantassa aññathā paṭijānantassa yathā so paṭijānāti, tathā saṅgho kāreti, evaṃ kho bhante adhammikaṃ hoti paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1343: Pucchā – kathaṃ āvuso dhammikaṃ hoti paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1344: Vissajjanā – yaṃ bhante āpattiṃ āpajjantassa tameva paṭijānantassa teneva saṅgho kāreti, evaṃ kho bhante dhammikaṃ paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1345: Pucchā – yebhuyyasikāya āvuso adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasametuṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1346_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṃ, sambahulā bhante
anya-e0905n:1346_1: bhikkhū bhaṇḍanajātā kalahajātā vivādāpannā aññamaññaṃ mukhasattīhi vitudantā vihariṃsu,
anya-e0905n:1346_2: na sakkonti taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasametuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1347: Pucchā – kathaṃ āvuso adhikaraṇaṃ yebhuyyasikāya vūpasametabbaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1348_0: Vissajjanā – pañcahi bhante aṅgehi samannāgato bhikkhu salākaggāhāpako sammannitabbo,
anya-e0905n:1348_1: tena bhante salākaggāhāpakena salākā gāhātabbā yathā bahutarā bhikkhū dhammavādino
anya-e0905n:1348_2: vadanti tathā taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasametabbaṃ, evaṃ kho bhante yebhuyyasikāya adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasametabbaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1350_0: Vissajjanā – dasa bhante adhammikā salākaggāhā, oramattakañca adhikaraṇaṃ hoti, na
anya-e0905n:1350_1: ca gatigataṃ hoti, na ca saritasāritaṃ hoti, jānāti ‘adhammavādī bahutarā’ti, appeva
anya-e0905n:1350_2: nāma adhammavādī bahutarā assūti, jānāti ‘saṅgho bhijjissatī’ti, appeva nāma saṅgho
anya-e0905n:1350_3: bhijjeyyāti, adhammena gaṇhanti, vaggā gaṇhanti, na ca yathādiṭṭhiyā gaṇhanti, ime
anya-e0905n:1352: Vissajjanā – dasa bhante dhammikā salākaggāhā vuttavipariyāyena.
anya-e0905n:1353: Pucchā – pāpussannassa āvuso bhikkhussa tassa pāpiyasikā kammaṃ kātuṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1354_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante upavāḷaṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, upavāḷo bhante
anya-e0905n:1354_1: bhikkhu saṅghamajjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjiyamāno avajānitvā paṭijānāti, paṭijānitvā avajānāti,
anya-e0905n:1354_2: aññenaññaṃ paṭicarati, sampajānamusā bhāsati, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1355: Pucchā – kati āvuso dhammikāni tassapāpiyasikā kammassa karaṇāni.
anya-e0905n:1356_0: Vissajjanā – pañcimāni bhante dhammikāni tassapāpiyasikā kammassa karaṇāni. Asuci
anya-e0905n:1356_1: ca hoti, alajjī ca, sānuvādo ca, tassa saṅgho tassapāpiyasikā kammaṃ karoti dhammena
anya-e0905n:1356_2: samaggena, imāni kho bhante pañca dhammikāni tassa pāpiyasikā kammassa karaṇāni.
anya-e0905n:1357: Pucchā – tassa pāpiyasikākammakatena āvuso bhikkhunā katisu vattesu sammā vattitabbaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1358_0: Vissajjanā – tassa pāpiyasikākammakatena bhante bhikkhunā aṭṭhārasasu vattesu sammā
anya-e0905n:1358_1: vattitabbaṃ. Na upasampādetabbaṃ, na nissayo dātabbo, na sāmaṇero upaṭṭhāpetabbo,
anya-e0905n:1358_2: evamādīsu bhante aṭṭhārasasu vattesu sammā vattitabbaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1359: Pucchā – kati āvuso adhikaraṇāni samathehi vūpasametabbāni.
anya-e0905n:1360_0: Vissajjanā – cattārimāni bhante adhikaraṇāni samathehi vūpasametabbāni, vivādādhikaraṇaṃ
anya-e0905n:1360_1: anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ āpattādhikaraṇaṃ kiccādhikaraṇaṃ, imāni bhante cattāri adhikaraṇāni
anya-e0905n:1362_0: Vissajjanā – cha bhante vivādamūlāni vivādādhikaraṇassa mūlaṃ, tīṇipi akusalamūlāni
anya-e0905n:1362_1: vivādādhikaraṇassa mūlaṃ, tīṇipi kusalamūlāni vivādādhikaraṇassa mūlaṃ, idaṃ bhante
anya-e0905n:1364_0: Vissajjanā – cha bhante anuvādamūlāni anuvādādhikaraṇassa mūlaṃ, tīṇipi akusalamūlāni
anya-e0905n:1364_1: anuvādādhikaraṇassa mūlaṃ, tīṇipi kusalamūlāni anuvādādhikaraṇassa mūlaṃ, kāyopi
anya-e0905n:1364_2: anuvādādhikaraṇassa mūlaṃ, vācāpi anuvādādhikaraṇassa mūlaṃ, idaṃ kho bhante anuvādādhikaraṇassa mūlaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1366_0: Vissajjanā – cha bhante āpattisamuṭṭhānā āpattādhikaraṇassa mūlaṃ, atti bhante āpatti
anya-e0905n:1366_1: kāyato samuṭṭhāti na vācato na cittato, atthi bhante āpatti vācato samuṭṭhāti na
anya-e0905n:1366_2: kāyato na cittato, atthi bhante āpatti kāyato ca vācato ca samuṭṭhāti na cittato,
anya-e0905n:1366_3: atthi bhante āpatti kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti na vācato, atthi bhante āpatti
anya-e0905n:1366_4: vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti na kāyato, atthi bhante āpatti kāyato ca vācato ca
anya-e0905n:1366_5: cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, imāni bhante cha āpatti samuṭṭhānāni āpattādhikaraṇassa mūlaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1368: Vissajjanā – kiccādhikaraṇassa bhante ekaṃ mūlaṃ saṅgho.
anya-e0905n:1369: Pucchā – samathaṃ āvuso pucchissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n:1370: Vissajjanā – samathaṃ bhante vissajjissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ bhante dve āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n:1372: Pucchā – nahāyantena āvuso bhikkhunā rukkhe vā thambhe vā kuṭṭe vā kāyaṃ ugghaṃsentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1373_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā bhante
anya-e0905n:1373_1: bhikkhū nahāyamānā rukkhepi thambhepi kuṭṭepi kāyaṃ ugghaṃsesuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1374: Pucchā – gandhabbahatthakena vā āvuso kuruvindakasuttiyā vā mallakena vā nahāyantassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1375_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante chabbaggiyeva bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā
anya-e0905n:1375_1: bhante bhikkhū gandhabbahatthakenapi kuruvindakasuttiyāpi mallakenapi nahāyiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:1376: Pucchā – pāṇinā āvuso parikammaṃ kātuṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1377: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṃ, sambahulā bhante bhikkhū piṭṭhiparikammaṃ kātuṃ kukkuccāyiṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1378_0: Pucchā – vallikaṃ vā āvuso pāmaṅgaṃ vā kaṇṭhasuttakaṃ vā kaṭisuttakaṃ vā ovaṭṭikaṃ
anya-e0905n:1378_1: vā kāyuraṃ vā hatthābharaṇaṃ vā aṅgulimuddikaṃ vā dhārentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā
anya-e0905n:1378_2: kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1379: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū vallikādīni dhāresuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1380: Pucchā – dīghe āvuso kese dhārentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1381: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū dīghe kese dhāresuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1382: Pucchā – kocchenavā āvuso phaṇakenavā hatthaphaṇakenavā kese osaṇṭhentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1383: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante chabbaggiyeva bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū kocchādīhi kese osaṇṭhesuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1384: Pucchā – ādāse vā āvuso udakapatte vā mukhanimittaṃ olokentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1385: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante chabbaggiyeva bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū ādāsepi udakapattepi mukhanimittaṃ olokesuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1386: Pucchā – ābādhapaccayā panāvuso ādāse vā udakapatte vā mukhanimittaṃ oloketuṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1387_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha anuññātaṃ, bhagavati bhante
anya-e0905n:1387_1: rājagahe viharati aññatarassa bhikkhuno mukhe vaṇo ahosi, so bhikkhū etadavoca “kīdiso
anya-e0905n:1387_2: me āvuso vaṇo”ti, bhikkhū evamāhaṃsu “ediso te āvuso vaṇo”ti, so na saddahati, tasmiṃ
anya-e0905n:1388: Pucchā – mukhālepanādīni āvuso karontassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1389: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū mukhālepanādīni akaṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
