anya-e0905n:1390: Pucchā – naccaṃ vā āvuso gītaṃ vā vāditaṃ vā dassanāya gacchantassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1391: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā bhante naccampi gītampi vāditampi dassanāya gacchiṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1392: Pucchā – kathaṃ āvuso naccādīni passantassa āpatti hoti, kathaṃ pana anāpatti.
anya-e0905n:1393_0: Vissajjanā – naccaṃ vā bhante gītaṃ vā vāditaṃ vā dassanāya gacchati āpatti dukkaṭassa,
anya-e0905n:1393_1: yattha ṭhito passati vā suṇāti vā āpatti dukkaṭassa, dassanūpacāraṃ vijahitvā punappunaṃ
anya-e0905n:1393_2: passati āpatti dukkaṭassa, ārāme ṭhitassa passato anāpatti, vihārato pana vihāraṃ
anya-e0905n:1393_3: passissāmīti gacchato āpattiyeva, yattha ṭhito passati vā suṇāti vā āpatti dukkaṭassa,
anya-e0905n:1393_4: āsanasālāya nisinno passati anāpatti, passissāmīti vuṭṭhahitvā gacchati āpatti dukkaṭassa,
anya-e0905n:1393_5: yattha ṭhito passati vā suṇāti vā āpatti dukkaṭassa, patipathaṃ gacchanto passati
anya-e0905n:1393_6: anāpatti, gīvaṃ parivattetvā passato pana āpatti bhante.
anya-e0905n:1394: Pucchā – āyatakena āvuso gītassarena dhammaṃ gāyantassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1395: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū āyatakena gītassarena dhammaṃ gāyiṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1396: Pucchā – dārupattaṃ āvuso dhārentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1397_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante āyasmantaṃ piṇḍolabhāradvājaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, āyasmā
anya-e0905n:1397_1: bhante piṇḍolabhāradvājo chavassa dārupattassa kāraṇā gihīnaṃ uttarimanussadhammaṃ
anya-e0905n:1397_2: iddhipāṭihāriyaṃ dasseti, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1398: Na ca bhikkhave dārupatto dhāretabbo, yo dhāreyya āpatti dukkaṭassa –
anya-e0905n:1399: Pucchā – bhagavatā āvuso uccāvace patte paṭikkhipitvā ayo patto bhūmipattoti imeyeva dve pattā kattha anuññātā, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ anuññātā.
anya-e0905n:1400: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātā, chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū uccāvace patte dhāresuṃ sovaṇṇamayā rūpiyamayā, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ anuññātā.
anya-e0905n:1401: Pucchā – sodakaṃ āvuso pattaṃ paṭisāmentassa ca otāpentassaca uṇhe pattaṃ nidahantassa ca dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1402_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, sambahulā bhante
anya-e0905n:1402_1: bhikkhū sodakaṃ pattaṃ paṭisāmesuṃ, otāpesuṃ, uṇhe pattaṃ nidahiṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante
anya-e0905n:1403: Pucchā – chavasīsapattaṃ āvuso dhārentassa ca sabbapaṃsukūlikassa ca dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1404_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, aññataro bhante
anya-e0905n:1404_1: bhikkhu sabbapaṃsukūliko ahosi, so chavasīsassa pattaṃ dhāresi, aññatarā itthī passitvā
anya-e0905n:1404_2: bhītā vissaramakāsi “abhuṃ me pisāco vatāya”nti, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1405: Pucchā – calakāni vā āvuso aṭṭhikāni vā ucchiṭṭhodakaṃ vā pattena nīharantassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1406_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, sambahulā bhante
anya-e0905n:1406_1: bhikkhū calakānipi aṭṭhikānipi ucchiṭṭho dakampi pattena nīhariṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante
anya-e0905n:1407: Pucchā – upāhanatthavikā āvuso bhagavatā kattha anuññātā, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ anuññātā.
anya-e0905n:1408_0: Vissajjanā – antarā ca bhante rājagahaṃ antarā ca vesāliṃ aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha
anya-e0905n:1408_1: anuññātā, aññataro bhante bhikkhu upāhanāyo kāyabandhanena bandhitvā gāmaṃ piṇḍāya
anya-e0905n:1408_2: pāvisi, aññataro upāsako taṃ bhikkhuṃ abhivādento upāhanāyo sīsena ghaṭṭeti, so bhikkhu
anya-e0905n:1408_3: maṅku ahosi, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ anuññātā.
anya-e0905n:1409_0: Pucchā – addhānamaggappaṭipannena āvuso parissāvanaṃ yāciyamānena na dadantassa ca
anya-e0905n:1409_1: appaṭissāvanakena addhānaṃ paṭipajjantassa ca dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1410_0: Vissajjanā – antarā ca bhante rājagahaṃ antarā ca vesāliṃ aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha
anya-e0905n:1410_1: paññattaṃ, aññataro bhante bhikkhu parissāvanaṃ yāciyamāno na adāsi, tasmiṃ bhante
anya-e0905n:1411: Pucchā – pupphābhikiṇṇe āvuso sayane sayantassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1412: Vissajjanā – vesāliyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū pupphābhikiṇṇesu sayanesu sayiṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1413_0: Pucchā – ekabhājane vā āvuso bhuñjantānaṃ ekathālake vā pivantānaṃ ekattharaṇapāvuraṇānaṃ
anya-e0905n:1413_1: vā tuvaṭṭānaṃ dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1414_0: Vissajjanā – vesāliyaṃ bhante chabbaggiyeva bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā
anya-e0905n:1414_1: bhante bhikkhū ekabhājanepi bhuñjiṃsu, ekathālakepi piviṃsu, ekamañcakepi tuvaṭṭesuṃ,
anya-e0905n:1414_2: ekattharaṇāpi tuvaṭṭesuṃ, ekapāvuraṇāpi tuvaṭṭesuṃ, ekattharaṇapāvuraṇāpi, tasmiṃ
anya-e0905n:1415: Pucchā – cāmaribījaniṃ āvuso paṭikkhipitvā tisso bījaniyo bhagavatā kattha anuññātā, kismiñca vatthusmiṃ anuññātā.
anya-e0905n:1416_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante anuññātā, sāvatthiyaṃ bhante bhagavati viharati saṅghassa
anya-e0905n:1416_1: cāmaribījanī uppannā ahosi, bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ anuññātā.
anya-e0905n:1417: Na bhikkhave cāmaribījanī dhāretabbā, yo dhāreyya, āpatti dukkaṭassa. Anujānāmi bhikkhave tisso bījaniyo vākamayaṃ usīramayaṃ morapiñchā mayaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1418: Pucchā – dīghe āvuso nakhe dhārentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1419: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, aññataro bhante bhikkhu dīghe nakhe dhāresi, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1420: Pucchā – kattarikāya āvuso kese chedāpentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1421: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū kattarikāya kese chindiṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1422: Pucchā – dīghe āvuso nāsikālome dhārentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1423: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, sambahulā bhante bhikkhū dīghāni nāsikālomāni dhāresuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1424: Pucchā – uccāvacā āvuso kaṇṇamalaharaṇiyo paṭikkhipitvā dasa kaṇṇamalaharaṇiyo bhagavatā kattha anuññātā, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ anuññātā.
anya-e0905n:1425_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātā, chabbaggiyā
anya-e0905n:1425_1: bhante bhikkhū uccāvacā kaṇṇamalaharaṇiyo dhāresuṃ sovaṇṇamayaṃ rūpiyamayaṃ, tasmiṃ
anya-e0905n:1426: Pucchā – saṅghāṭipallatthikāya nisīdantassa āvuso dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1427_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā
anya-e0905n:1427_1: bhante bhikkhū saṅghāṭipallatthikāya nisīdiṃsu, saṅghāṭiyā pattā lujjiṃsu, tasmiṃ
anya-e0905n:1428: Pucchā – akāyabandhanena āvuso gāmaṃ pavisantassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1429: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, aññataro bhante bhikkhu akāyabandhano gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1430: Pucchā – gihinivatthaṃ āvuso nivāsentassa ca, gihipārutaṃ pārupantassa ca, saṃvelliyaṃ nivāsentassa ca dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1431_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā
anya-e0905n:1431_1: bhante bhikkhū gihinivatthaṃ nivāsiṃsu, gihipārutampi pārupiṃsu, saṃvelliyampi nivāsiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:1432: Pucchā – ubhato kājaṃ āvuso dhārentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1433: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū ubhato kājaṃ dhāresuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1434: Pucchā – lokāyataṃ āvuso pariyāpuṇantassa ca vācentassa ca dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1435: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū lokāyataṃ pariyāpuṇiṃsupi vācesumpi, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1436: Pucchā – tiracchānavijjaṃ āvuso pariyāpuṇantassa ca vācentassa ca dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1437: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū tiracchānavijjaṃ pariyāpuṇiṃsupi vācesumpi, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1438: Pucchā – khipite āvuso “jīvā”tivadantassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1439_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, bhagavā bhante
anya-e0905n:1439_1: mahatiyā parisāya parivuto dhammaṃ desento khipi, bhikkhū “jīvatu bhante bhagavā,
anya-e0905n:1439_2: jīvatu sugatoti” uccāsaddaṃ mahāsaddaṃ akaṃsu, tena saddena dhammakathā antarā ahosi,
anya-e0905n:1440: Pucchā – ārāme āvuso passāvavaccānaṃ tahaṃ tahaṃ karaṇaṃ paṭikkhipitvā ekamantaṃ kātuṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1441_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, sambahulā bhante
anya-e0905n:1441_1: bhikkhū ārāme tahaṃ tahaṃ passāvaṃ akaṃsu, tahaṃ tahaṃ vaccaṃ akaṃsu, ārāmo dussi,
anya-e0905n:1443: Pucchā – khuddakavatthuṃ pucchissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n:1444: Vissajjanā – khuddakaṃ vissajjissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ bhante tisso āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n:1446: Pucchā – pañca āvuso leṇāni bhagavatā kattha anuññātāni, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ anuññātāni.
anya-e0905n:1447_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātāni, sambahulā bhante
anya-e0905n:1447_1: bhikkhū bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavocuṃ “rājagahako bhante seṭṭhī vihāre kārāpetukāmo,
anya-e0905n:1447_2: kathaṃ nu kho bhante paṭipajjitabba”nti, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ anuññātāni.
anya-e0905n:1448: Pucchā – kathaṃ āvuso vihārā paṭhamaṃ uppannā, kathañca te patiṭṭhāpi tā.
anya-e0905n:1449: Vissajjanā – ekāheneva bhante rājagahakena seṭṭhinā chaṭṭhivihārā patiṭṭhāpitā, te idha bhante saṭṭhivihārā buddhappamukhassa āgatānāgatassa cātuddisassa saṅghassa patiṭṭhāpitā.
anya-e0905n:1450: Pucchā – vihāre āvuso paṭibhānakammaṃ paṭikkhipitvā mālākammādīni bhagavatā kattha anuññātāni, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ anuññātāni.
anya-e0905n:1451_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātāni. Chabbaggiyā
anya-e0905n:1451_1: bhante bhikkhū vihāre paṭibhānacittaṃ kārāpesuṃ itthirūpakaṃ purisarūpakaṃ, tasmiṃ
anya-e0905n:1452_0: Pucchā – yathāvuḍḍhaṃ āvuso abhivādanādīni ca aggāsanādīni ca anujānitvā saṅghikaṃ
anya-e0905n:1452_1: yathāvuḍḍhaṃ paṭibāhantassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ
anya-e0905n:1453_0: Vissajjanā – antarā ca bhante vesāliṃ antarā ca sāvatthiṃ chabbaggiyānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
anya-e0905n:1453_1: antevāsike bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyānaṃ bhante bhikkhūnaṃ antevāsikā
anya-e0905n:1453_2: bhikkhū buddhappamukhassa saṅghassa purato purato gantvā vihāre paṭiggahesuṃ, seyyāyo
anya-e0905n:1453_3: paṭiggahesuṃ “idaṃ amhākaṃ upajjhāyānaṃ bhavissati, idaṃ amhākaṃ ācariyānaṃ bhavissati,
anya-e0905n:1453_4: idaṃ amhākaṃ bhavissatī”ti, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1454: Pucchā – ekena āvuso dve paṭibāhantassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1455: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, āyasmā bhante upanando sakyaputto eko dve paṭibāhi, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1456_0: Pucchā – navakena āvuso uddisantena samake vā āsane nisīdituṃ uccatare vā dhammagāravena,
anya-e0905n:1456_1: therena pana bhikkhunā uddisāpentena samake vā āsane nisīdituṃ nīcatare vā dhammagāravena
anya-e0905n:1456_2: bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1457_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṃ, sambahulā bhante
anya-e0905n:1457_1: bhikkhū āyasmato upālissa santike vinayaṃ pariyāpuṇiṃsu, āyasmā bhante upāli ṭhitakova
anya-e0905n:1457_2: uddisati therānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ gāravena, tattha bhante therā ceva bhikkhū kilamiṃsu
anya-e0905n:1457_3: āyasmā ca upāli kilami, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1458: Pucchā – tivassantarena āvuso saha nisīdituṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1459_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṃ, sambahulānaṃ
anya-e0905n:1459_1: bhante bhikkhūnaṃ etadahosi “kittāvatānu kho samānāsaniko hotī”ti, tasmiṃ bhante
anya-e0905n:1460: Pucchā – mañce ca āvuso pīṭhe ca dvinnaṃyeva nisīdituṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1461_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule samānāsanike ārabbha paññattaṃ, sambahulā
anya-e0905n:1461_1: bhante bhikkhū samānāsanikā mañce nisīditvā mañcaṃ bhindiṃsu, pīṭhe nisīditvā pīṭhaṃ
anya-e0905n:1462: Pucchā – dīghāsane panāvuso asamānāsanikehipi nisīdituṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1463_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṃ, sambahulā bhante
anya-e0905n:1463_1: bhikkhū dīghāsane asamānāsanikehi saha nisīdituṃ kukkuccāyiṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1464: Pucchā – pañca āvuso avissajjiyāni bhagavatā kattha paññattāni, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattāni.
anya-e0905n:1465: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattāni, sambahulā bhante bhikkhū saṅghikaṃ senāsanaṃ vissajjesuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1466: Pucchā – pañca āvuso avebhaṅgiyāni bhagavatā kattha paññattāni, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattāni.
anya-e0905n:1467: Vissajjanā – kīṭāgirismiṃ bhante assajipunabbasuke bhikkhū ārabbha paññattāni, assajipunabbasukā bhante bhikkhū saṅghikaṃ senāsanaṃ vibhajiṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattāni.
anya-e0905n:1468: Pucchā – aññatra paribhogaṃ āvuso aññatra paribhuñjantassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1469_0: Vissajjanā – āḷaviyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, sambahulā bhante
anya-e0905n:1469_1: bhikkhū aññatarassa upāsakassa vihāraparibhogaṃ senāsanaṃ aññatra paribhuñjiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:1470_0: Pucchā – adhotehi ca āvuso allehi ca pādehi senāsanaṃ akkamantassa ca saupāhanena
anya-e0905n:1470_1: senāsanaṃ akkamantassa ca dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ
anya-e0905n:1471_0: Vissajjanā – āḷaviyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, sambahulā bhante
anya-e0905n:1471_1: bhikkhū adhotehi pādehi senāsanaṃ akkamiṃsu, allehi ca pādehi senāsanaṃ akkamiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:1471_2: saupāhanāpi senāsanaṃ akkamiṃsu, senāsanaṃ dussi, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1472: Pucchā – parikammakatāya āvuso bhūmiyā niṭṭhubhantassa ca parikammakataṃ bhittiṃ apassayantassa ca dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1473_0: Vissajjanā – āḷaviyaṃ bhante sambahuleva bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, sambahulā bhante
anya-e0905n:1473_1: bhikkhū parikammakatāya bhūmiyā niṭṭhubhiṃsu, parikammakataṃ bhittiṃ apassayiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:1474: Pucchā – senāsanakkhandhakaṃ pucchissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n:1475: Vissajjanā – senāsanakkhandhakaṃ vissajjissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ bhante tisso āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n:1477: Pucchā – kathaṃ āvuso channaṃ sakyakumārānaṃ saha upālikappakena pabbajjā ahosi, kathañca nesaṃ viseso udapādi.
anya-e0905n:1478_0: Vissajjanā – bhagavā bhante upāliṃ kappakaṃ paṭhamaṃ pabbājesi, pacchā te sakyakumāre,
anya-e0905n:1478_1: atha bhante āyasmā bhaddiyo teneva antaravassena tisso vijjā sacchākāsi, āyasmā anuruddho
anya-e0905n:1478_2: dibbacakkhuṃ uppādesi, āyasmā ānando sotāpattiphalaṃ sacchākāsi, devadatto pothujjanikaṃ
anya-e0905n:1478_3: iddhiṃ abhinipphādesi. Evaṃ kho bhante channaṃ sakyakumārānaṃ upālikappakena saha
anya-e0905n:1478_4: pabbajjā ahosi, evañca pana bhante tesaṃ visesādhigamo ahosi.
anya-e0905n:1480: Pucchā – pakāsanīyakammaṃ āvuso kātuṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1481_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante devadattaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, devadatto bhante “sarājikāya
anya-e0905n:1481_1: maṃ bhagavā parisāya kheḷāsakavādena apasādeti, sāriputtamoggallāneva ukkaṃsatī”ti
anya-e0905n:1481_2: kupito anattamano bhagavati āghātaṃ bandhi, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1483: Pucchā – devadattassa āvuso pakāsanīyakammaṃ kārāpetvā kathaṃ bhagavā pakāsetuṃ āṇāpesi.
anya-e0905n:1484_0: Vissajjanā – bhagavā bhante devadattassa pakāsanīyakammaṃ kātuṃ paññapetvā āyasmantaṃ
anya-e0905n:1484_1: sāriputtaṃ āmantesi “tena hi tvaṃ sāriputta devadattaṃ rājagahe pakāsehī”ti, evaṃ
anya-e0905n:1484_2: kho bhante devadattassa pakāsanīyakammaṃ katvā devadattaṃ rājagahe pakāsetuṃ bhagavā āṇāpesi.
anya-e0905n:1486: Pucchā – kathaṃ āvuso devadattena duṭṭhacittena vadhakacittena tathā gatassa ruhiraṃ uppādetvā paṭhamaṃ ānantariyaṃ kammaṃ upacitaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1487_0: Vissajjanā – bhagavā bhante gijjhakūṭassa pabbatassa chāyāyaṃ caṅkami, atha bhante
anya-e0905n:1487_1: devadatto gijjhakūṭaṃ pabbataṃ āruhitvā mahatiṃ silaṃ pavijjhi “imāya samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ
anya-e0905n:1487_2: jīvitā voropessāmī”ti, atha kho bhante dve pabbatakūṭāni samāgantvā taṃ silaṃ sampaṭicchiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:1487_3: tato papatikā uppatitvā bhagavato pāde ruhiraṃ uppādesi. Evaṃ kho bhante devadattena
anya-e0905n:1487_4: duṭṭhena vadhakacittena tathāgatassa ruhiraṃ uppādetvā paṭhamaṃ ānantariyakammaṃ upacitaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1488: Pucchā – kulesu āvuso tikabhojanaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1489: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante devadattaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, devadatto bhante parihīnalābhasakkāro sapariso kulesu viññāpetvā viññāpetvā bhuñji, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1490: Pucchā – alaṃ devadatta, mā te rucci saṅghabhedo, garuko kho devadatta saṅghabhedotiādiko āvuso ovādo bhagavatā kattha dinno, kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ dinno.
anya-e0905n:1491: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante devadattaṃ ārabbha dinno, devadatto bhante saṅghabhedāya parakkami cakkabhedāya, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ dinno.
anya-e0905n:1492: Alaṃ devadatta, mā te rucci saṅghabhedo, garuko kho devadatta saṅghabhedo –
anya-e0905n:1493_0: Pucchā – “sukaraṃ sādhunā sādhuṃ, sādhuṃ pāpena dukkaraṃ. Pāpaṃ pāpena sukaraṃ, pāpamariyehi
anya-e0905n:1493_1: dukkara”nti- āvuso idaṃ udānaṃ bhagavatā kattha udānitaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ udānitaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1494_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante devadattaṃyeva ārabbha udānitaṃ, āyasmā bhante ānando
anya-e0905n:1494_1: pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya rājagahaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi, atha kho bhante
anya-e0905n:1494_2: devadatto yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ etadavoca
anya-e0905n:1494_3: “ajjatagge dānāhaṃ āvuso ānanda aññatreva bhagavatā aññatreva bhikkhusaṅghā uposathaṃ
anya-e0905n:1494_4: karissāmi saṅghakammaṃ karissāmī”ti, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ udānitaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1495: Sukaraṃ sādhunā sādhuṃ, sādhuṃ pāpena dukkaraṃ;
anya-e0905n:1497: Pucchā – bhedānuvattakānaṃ āvuso bhikkhūnaṃ thullaccayaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1498_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, āyasmā bhante sāriputto
anya-e0905n:1498_1: bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca “sādhu bhante bhedānuvattakā bhikkhū puna upasampajjeyyu”nti,
anya-e0905n:1500: Pucchā – kittāvatā nu kho āvuso saṅgharāji hoti no ca saṅghabhedo, kittāvatā ca pana saṅgharāji ceva hoti saṅghabhedo ca.
anya-e0905n:1501_0: Vissajjanā – ekato bhante eko hoti, ekato dve catuttho anussāveti, salākaṃ gāheti
anya-e0905n:1501_1: “ayaṃ dhammo ayaṃ vinayo idaṃ satthusāsanaṃ imaṃ gaṇhatha imaṃ rocethāti”, eteneva
anya-e0905n:1501_2: bhante nayena catunnaṃ vā pañcannaṃ vā channaṃ vā sattannaṃ vā aṭṭhannaṃ vā saṅgharāji
anya-e0905n:1501_3: hoti, no ca saṅghabhedo, ekato bhante cattāro honti, ekato cattāro, navamo anussāveti,
anya-e0905n:1501_4: salākaṃ gāheti “ayaṃ dhammo ayaṃ vinayo idaṃ satthusāsanaṃ imaṃ gaṇhatha imaṃ rocethā”ti,
anya-e0905n:1501_5: evaṃ kho bhante saṅgharāji ceva hoti saṅghabhedo ca. Evaṃ kho bhante saṅgharāji hoti,
anya-e0905n:1501_6: no ca saṅghabhedo, evañca pana bhante saṅgharāji ceva hoti saṅghabhedo ca.
anya-e0905n:1502: Pucchā – kittāvatā nu kho āvuso saṅgho bhinno hoti.
anya-e0905n:1503_0: Vissajjanā – idha bhante bhikkhū adhammādiṃ dhammādīnīti dīpenti, te imehi aṭṭhārasahi
anya-e0905n:1503_1: vatthūhi apakassanti, avapakassanti, āveniṃ uposathaṃ karonti, āveniṃ pavāraṇaṃ karonti,
anya-e0905n:1503_2: āveniṃ saṅghakammaṃ karonti, evaṃ kho bhante saṅgho bhinno hoti.
anya-e0905n:1504: Pucchā – kittāvatā nu kho āvuso saṅgho samaggo hoti.
anya-e0905n:1505_0: Vissajjanā – idha bhante bhikkhū adhammaṃ adhammoti dīpenti, dhammaṃ dhammoti dīpenti,
anya-e0905n:1505_1: avinayaṃ avinayoti dīpenti…pe… duṭṭhullaṃ āpattiṃ duṭṭhullā āpattīti dīpenti, aduṭṭhullaṃ
anya-e0905n:1505_2: āpattiṃ aduṭṭhullā āpattīti dīpenti, te imehi aṭṭhārasahi vatthūhi na apakassanti,
anya-e0905n:1505_3: na avapakassanti, na āveniṃ uposathaṃ karonti, na āveniṃ pavāraṇaṃ karonti, na āveniṃ
anya-e0905n:1505_4: saṅghakammaṃ karonti, ettāvatā kho bhante saṅgho samaggo hoti.
anya-e0905n:1506: Pucchā – samaggaṃ āvuso saṅghaṃ bhinditvā kiṃ so pasavati.
anya-e0905n:1507: Vissajjanā – samaggaṃ kho bhante saṅghaṃ bhinditvā kappaṭṭhitikaṃ kibbisaṃ pasavati, kappaṃ nirayamhi paccati.
anya-e0905n:1508: Pucchā – bhinnaṃ kho āvuso saṅghaṃ samaggaṃ katvā kiṃ so pasavati.
anya-e0905n:1509: Vissajjanā – bhinnaṃ kho bhante saṅghaṃ samaggaṃ katvā brahmaṃ puññaṃ pasavati, kappaṃ saggamhi modati.
anya-e0905n:1510: Pucchā – saṅghabhedaṃ pucchissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n:1511: Vissajjanā – saṅghabhedaṃ vissajjissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ bhante dve āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n:1513: Pucchā – āgantukānaṃ āvuso bhikkhūnaṃ vattaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1514_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule āgantuke bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, āgantukā
anya-e0905n:1514_1: bhante bhikkhū saupāhanāpi ārāmaṃ pavisiṃsu, chattapaggahitāpi ārāmaṃ pavisiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:1514_2: oguṇṭhitāpi ārāmaṃ pavisiṃsu, sīsepi cīvaraṃ karitvā ārāmaṃ pavisiṃsu, pānīyenapi
anya-e0905n:1514_3: pāde doviṃsu, vuḍḍhatarepi āvāsike bhikkhū nābhivādesuṃ, napi senāsanaṃ pucchiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:1514_4: tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “tena hi bhikkhave āgantukānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vattaṃ paññapessāmi,
anya-e0905n:1514_5: yathā āgantukehi bhikkhūhi sammā vattitabbaṃ, āgantukena bhikkhave bhikkhunā idāni
anya-e0905n:1514_6: ārāmaṃ pavisissāmīti upāhanā omuñcitvā nīcaṃ katvā papphoṭetvā gahetvā chattaṃ apanāmetvā
anya-e0905n:1514_7: sīsaṃ vivaritvā sīse cīvaraṃ khandhe katvā sādhukaṃ ataramānena ārāmo pavisitabbo”
anya-e0905n:1514_8: evamādinā bhante āgantukānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vattaṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1515: Pucchā – āvāsikānaṃ āvuso bhikkhūnaṃ vattaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, kathañca pana paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1516_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule āvāsike bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, sambahulā
anya-e0905n:1516_1: bhante āvāsikā bhikkhū āgantuke bhikkhū disvā neva āsanaṃ paññapesuṃ, na pādodakaṃ
anya-e0905n:1516_2: pādapīṭhaṃ pādakathalikaṃ upanikkhipiṃsu, na paccuggantvā pattacīvaraṃ paṭiggahesuṃ,
anya-e0905n:1516_3: na senāsanaṃ paññapesuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ –
anya-e0905n:1517_0: “Āvāsikena bhikkhave bhikkhunā āgantukaṃ bhikkhuṃ vuḍḍhataraṃ disvā āsanaṃ paññapetabbaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1517_1: pādodakaṃ pādapīṭhaṃ pādakathalikaṃ upanikkhipitabbaṃ, paccuggantvā pattacīvaraṃ
anya-e0905n:1517_2: paṭiggahetabbaṃ pānīyena pucchitabbo” evamādinā bhante āvāsikānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vattaṃ
anya-e0905n:1518: Pucchā – gamikānaṃ āvuso bhikkhūnaṃ vattaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, kathañcapana paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1519_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule gamike bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, sambahulā
anya-e0905n:1519_1: bhante gamikā bhikkhū dārubhaṇḍaṃ mattikābhaṇḍaṃ appaṭisāmetvā dvāravātapānaṃ vivaritvā
anya-e0905n:1519_2: senāsanaṃ anāpucchā pakkamiṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “gamikena bhikkhave bhikkhunā
anya-e0905n:1519_3: dārubhaṇḍaṃ paṭisāmetvā dvāravātapānaṃ thaketvā senāsanaṃ āpucchā pakkamitabbaṃ”
anya-e0905n:1519_4: evamādinā bhante ākārena bhagavatā gamikānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vattaṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1520: Pucchā – bhattagge āvuso anumodituṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1521: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṃ, sambahulā bhante bhikkhū bhattagge nānumodiṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1522: Pucchā – bhikkhūnaṃ āvuso bhattaggavattaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1523_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā
anya-e0905n:1523_1: bhante bhikkhū dunnivatthā duppārutā anākappasampannā bhattaggaṃ gacchiṃsu, tasmiṃ
anya-e0905n:1523_2: bhante vatthusmiṃ “sace ārāme kālo ārocito hoti, timaṇḍalaṃ paṭicchādentena parimaṇḍalaṃ
anya-e0905n:1523_3: nivāsetvā kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvā saguṇaṃ katvā saṅghāṭiyo pārupitvā gaṇṭhikaṃ paṭimuñcitvā
anya-e0905n:1523_4: dhovitvā pattaṃ gahetvā sādhukaṃ ataramānena gāmo pavisitabbo”ti evamādinā bhante
anya-e0905n:1524: Pucchā – bhikkhūnaṃ āvuso senāsanavattaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, kathañca taṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1525_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā
anya-e0905n:1525_1: bhante bhikkhū bhikkhūsu ajjhokāse cīvaraṃ karontesu paṭivāte aṅgaṇe senāsanaṃ papphoṭesuṃ,
anya-e0905n:1525_2: tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “yasmiṃ vihāre viharati, sace so vihāro uklāpo hoti, sace
anya-e0905n:1525_3: ussahati sodhetabbo”ti evamādinā bhante bhikkhūnaṃ senāsanavattaṃ bhagavatā paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1526: Pucchā – samācāraṃ pucchissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n:1527: Vissajjanā – samācāraṃ vissajjissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ bhante ekā āpatti.
anya-e0905n:1529: Pucchā – sāpattikena āvuso pātimokkhaṃ suṇantassa pātimokkhaṃ ṭhapetuṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1530_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ puggalaṃ dussīlaṃ pāpadhammaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1530_1: aññataro bhante puggalo dussīlo pāpadhammo tadahuposathe saṅghamajjhe nisinno ahosi,
anya-e0905n:1531: Pucchā – ṭhapanaṃ āvuso pucchissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n:1532: Vissajjanā – ṭhapanaṃ vissajjissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ bhante ekā āpatti.
anya-e0905n:1534: Pucchā – aṭṭhahi āvuso garudhammehi upasampadā bhagavatā kattha anuññātā, kassa anuññātā, kismiñca vatthusmiṃ anuññātā.
anya-e0905n:1535_0: Vissajjanā – vesāliyaṃ bhante mahāpajāpatiyā gotamiyā anuññātā, mahāpajāpati bhante
anya-e0905n:1535_1: gotamī sūnehi pādehi rajokiṇṇena gattena dukkhī dummanā assumukhī rudamānā bahidvārakoṭṭhake
anya-e0905n:1535_2: aṭṭhāsi, atha kho bhante āyasmā ānando mahāpajāpatiṃ gotamiṃ taṃ kāraṇaṃ pucchitvā
anya-e0905n:1535_3: bhagavantaṃ catukkhattuṃ yāci mātugāmassa tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye āgārasmā
anya-e0905n:1535_4: anāgāriyaṃ pabbajjaṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ anuññātā.
anya-e0905n:1536: Pucchā – bhikkhūhi āvuso bhikkhuniyo upasampādetuṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1537_0: Vissajjanā – vesāliyaṃ bhante mahāpajāpatiṃ gotamiṃ ārabbha anuññātaṃ, mahāpajāpati
anya-e0905n:1537_1: bhante gotamī bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “kathāhaṃ bhante imāsu sākiyānīsu paṭipajjāmī”ti,
anya-e0905n:1538: Pucchā – ekato upasampannāya āvuso bhikkhunisaṅghe visuddhāya bhikkhusaṅghe upasampādetuṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1539_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṃ, sambahulā bhante
anya-e0905n:1539_1: bhikkhū bhikkhunīnaṃ antarāyike dhamme pucchiṃsu, upasampadāpekkhāyo vitthāyiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:1539_2: maṅkū ahesuṃ, na sakkhiṃsu vissajjetuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1540: Pucchā – bhikkhunikkhandhakaṃ pucchissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n:1541: Vissajjanā – bhikkhunikkhandhakaṃ vissajjissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ bhante dve āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n:1544: Pucchā – pañcasatikaṃ pucchissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n:1545: Vissajjanā – pañcasatikaṃ vissajjissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ bhante na katamā āpatti.
anya-e0905n:1548: Pucchā – sattasatikaṃ pucchissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n:1549: Vissajjanā – sattasatikaṃ vissajjissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ bhante na katamā āpatti.
anya-e0905n:1551: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0905n:1553: Vissajjanā – sekkhā ca bhante puthujjanakalyāṇakā ca sikkhanti.
